game.title: Grand Theft Auto IV
game.description:
Grand Theft Auto IV is an action-adventure video game developed by Rockstar North and published by Rockstar Games. It is the eleventh title in the Grand Theft Auto series, and the first main entry since 2004's Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas.

The game is played from a third-person perspective and its world is navigated on-foot or by vehicle. Throughout the single-player mode, players play as Niko Bellic. An online multiplayer mode is included with the game, allowing up to 32 players to engage in both co-operative and competitive gameplay in a recreation of the single-player setting.

Two expansion packs were later released for the game, The Lost and Damned and The Ballad of Gay Tony, which both feature new plots that are interconnected with the main Grand Theft Auto IV storyline, and follow new protagonists.

Grand Theft Auto IV follows the story of Niko Bellic, a veteran of an unnamed war in Eastern Europe, who is haunted by the betrayal of his 15 man army unit. Ten years later, after a smuggling run goes bad due to a betrayal from a partner, Niko leaves Eastern Europe to escape the anger of his employer, Ray Bulgarin. After six months in the merchant navy (serving aboard the cargo ship the Platypus), and believing the stories of his cousin Roman, Niko comes to Liberty City to pursue the American Dream as well as searching for the traitor of his unit. After his arrival, however, Niko quickly learns that Roman's tales of riches and luxury were lies concealing struggles with gambling debts and loansharks, and that Roman lives in a dirty apartment rather than a mansion.

Important Updates To Grand Theft Auto IV and Episodes from Liberty City  We are making a number of changes to make sure players who own Grand Theft Auto IV and GTA: Episodes from Liberty City can continue to enjoy these games.  New Players  Starting 03/19/2020, Grand Theft Auto IV: Complete Edition will replace both Grand Theft Auto IV and Grand Theft Auto: Episodes from Liberty City wherever it is currently digitally available. Grand Theft Auto IV: Complete Edition will as also be available via the Rockstar Games Launcher. 
 
 Current game save files will be compatible with Grand Theft Auto IV: Complete Edition.
 
 As a result of this update  the following services will no longer be available in Grand Theft Auto IV: Complete Edition :
   Games for Windows Live
   Multiplayer mode
   Leaderboards  
 The following Radio Stations will be temporarily unavailable in Grand Theft Auto IV: Complete Edition
   RamJam FM, Self-Actualization FM, and Vice City FM (previously available in Grand Theft Auto: Episodes from Liberty City)  
  Note:  Because Japanese is a supported language for Grand Theft Auto IV, but is not supported for Grand Theft Auto: Episodes from Liberty City, players will continue to be able to play Grand Theft Auto IV with Japanese sub-titles but will need to select another language in order to play Grand Theft Auto: Episodes from Liberty City.  Current Players  Players who have previously installed and played Grand Theft Auto IV or Grand Theft Auto: Episodes from Liberty City will be able to update their copy to Grand Theft Auto IV: Complete Edition through the following means:  Steam Users   Depending on the game, players on Steam will need to install or update their current game:
    Grand Theft Auto: Episodes from Liberty City will be removed and replaced with GTAIV: Complete Edition in the launcher library. Update file size is expected to be approximately 22GB
    Grand Theft Auto IV owners will download content from Grand Theft Auto: Episodes from Liberty City and their game will update to GTAIV: Complete Edition. Update file size is expected to be approximately 6GB     Physical Media     Games not previously activated using Games for Windows Live will be able to use the Key on the back of the game manual to activate and update to Grand Theft Auto IV: Complete Edition    Games for Windows Live Digital Store Purchases     Games previously activated using Games for Windows Live will require players to create and/or link their Social Club accounts in replacement of Games for Windows Live to update to Grand Theft Auto IV: Complete Edition  
  Note:  New activations from players trying to install current copies of Grand Theft Auto IV may be disrupted until Grand Theft Auto IV: Complete Edition is available. All users will need to be connected to the internet and authenticate their copy of the game.
 
  About the Game Niko Bellic, Johnny Klebitz, and Luis Lopez all have one thing in common – they live in the worst city in America. Liberty City worships money and status, and is heaven for those who have them and a living nightmare for those who don’t. 
 
 Niko is looking to escape his past and make a new life for himself in the land of opportunity. Johnny, a veteran member of The Lost biker gang, is caught in the middle of a vicious turf war with rival gangs for control of the city. Luis, part-time hoodlum and full-time assistant to legendary nightclub impresario Tony Prince (a.k.a. “Gay Tony”), is struggling with the competing loyalties of family and friends in a world in which everyone has a price. Their lives cross paths with devastating consequences as they fight to survive in a city torn apart by violence and corruption.
 
 The Complete Edition includes Grand Theft Auto IV and the Episodes – The Lost and Damned & The Ballad of Gay Tony.

  Acerca del juego Niko Bellic, Johnny Klebitz y Luis Lopez tienen una cosa en común: viven en la peor ciudad de Estados Unidos. En Liberty City, el dinero y el estatus social lo son todo, y dependiendo de si los tienes o no vivirás en el cielo o en el infierno.
 
 Niko intenta dejar atrás el pasado y forjarse una nueva vida en la tierra de las oportunidades. Johnny, un veterano de la banda de moteros Lost, se encuentra atrapado en una salvaje guerra territorial entre bandas rivales que desean controlar la ciudad. Luis, mitad criminal, mitad ayudante a tiempo completo del legendario empresario de locales nocturnos Tony Prince (alias "Gay Tony"), lucha para competir por la lealtad de familiares y amigos en un mundo en el que todos tienen un precio. Sus vidas se cruzarán con consecuencias devastadoras mientras luchan por sobrevivir en una ciudad destrozada por la violencia y la corrupción.
 
 La Complete Edition incluye Grand Theft Auto IV y los episodios The Lost and Damned y The Ballad of Gay Tony.

  À propos du jeu Niko Bellic, Johnny Klebitz et Luis Lopez ont une chose en commun : ils vivent dans la ville la plus terrible d'Amérique. Liberty City est une ville où l'argent et le statut social règnent en maîtres. Un paradis pour ceux qui ont tout, un enfer pour les autres. 
 
 Niko cherche à échapper à son passé pour commencer une nouvelle vie au pays de la liberté. Johnny, un pilier du gang de motards The Lost, se retrouve au milieu d'une guerre de gangs se disputant le contrôle de Liberty City. Luis Lopez, truand à ses heures et assistant du légendaire imprésario des night-clubs, Tony Prince (alias "Gay Tony"), se bat pour la loyauté à sa famille et à ses amis dans un monde où tout le monde s'achète.   Infos zum Spiel Niko Bellic, Johnny Klebitz und Luis Lopez haben eines gemeinsam – sie leben in der schlimmsten Stadt Amerikas. Wer in Liberty City über Geld und Statussymbole verfügt, erlebt den Himmel auf Erden, alle anderen einen wahr gewordenen Albtraum.
 
 Niko versucht, seiner Vergangenheit zu entfliehen und im Land der unbegrenzten Möglichkeiten ein neues Leben zu beginnen. Johnny, ein treues Mitglied der Biker-Gang „The Lost“, findet sich inmitten eines erbitterten Revierkampfes mit rivalisierenden Gangs wieder. Luis, Teilzeit-Ganove und Vollzeit-Assistent des legendären Nachtclub-Impresarios Tony Prince (besser bekannt als „Gay Tony“), kämpft mit den konkurrierenden Loyalitäten von Familie und Freunden.  The Complete Edition beinhaltet Grand Theft Auto IV sowie die Episoden – The Lost and Damned & The Ballad of Gay Tony.

 Niko quer fugir ao seu passado e criar uma nova vida na terra das oportunidades. Johnny, membro veterano do gang de motoqueiros The Lost, foi apanhado no meio de uma violenta guerra territorial com grupos rivais pelo controlo da cidade.   Om spillet Niko Bellic, Johnny Klebitz og Luis Lopez har alle én ting til fælles – de bor i USA's værste by. Liberty City tilbeder penge og status og er et paradis for dem, der har dem, og et levende mareridt for dem, der ikke har dem.

  Informazioni sul gioco Niko Bellic, Johnny Klebitz e Luis Lopez hanno tutti una cosa in comune: vivono nella peggior città di tutta l'America. Liberty City è una città che venera denaro e status, un paradiso per chi li possiede entrambi, ma un incubo per chi non ha né l'uno né l'altro. 
 
 Niko sta cercando di sfuggire al suo passato e di cominciare una nuova vita nella terra delle opportunità. Johnny, un membro di lungo corso della banda di motociclisti dei Lost, si trova invischiato in una feroce lotta con bande rivali per il controllo del territorio cittadino. Luis, teppista part-time e assistente full-time del leggendario proprietario di nightclub Tony Prince (soprannominato "Gay Tony"), deve guardarsi dalla fedeltà di amici e parenti in un mondo in cui ciascuno ha il proprio prezzo. Nel tentativo di sopravvivere in una città dilaniata dalla violenza e dalla corruzione, le loro vite si incrociano con conseguenze devastanti.
 
 Grand Theft Auto IV: The Complete Edition include Grand Theft Auto IV e gli episodi The Lost and Damned e The Ballad of Gay Tony.
computerspil fra 2008
videogioco del 2008

game.brief:
Grand Theft Auto IV is an action-adventure video game developed by Rockstar North and published by Rockstar Games. It is the eleventh title in the Grand Theft Auto series, and the first main entry since 2004's Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas.

The game is played from a third-person perspective and its world is navigated on-foot or by vehicle. Throughout the single-player mode, players play as Niko Bellic. An online multiplayer mode is included with the game, allowing up to 32 players to engage in both co-operative and competitive gameplay in a recreation of the single-player setting.

Two expansion packs were later released for the game, The Lost and Damned and The Ballad of Gay Tony, which both feature new plots that are interconnected with the main Grand Theft Auto IV storyline, and follow new protagonists.

Grand Theft Auto IV follows the story of Niko Bellic, a veteran of an unnamed war in Eastern Europe, who is haunted by the betrayal of his 15 man army unit. Ten years later, after a smuggling run goes bad due to a betrayal from a partner, Niko leaves Eastern Europe to escape the anger of his employer, Ray Bulgarin. After six months in the merchant navy (serving aboard the cargo ship the Platypus), and believing the stories of his cousin Roman, Niko comes to Liberty City to pursue the American Dream as well as searching for the traitor of his unit. After his arrival, however, Niko quickly learns that Roman's tales of riches and luxury were lies concealing struggles with gambling debts and loansharks, and that Roman lives in a dirty apartment rather than a mansion.

game.title: League of Legends
game.description: League of Legends is a fast-paced, competitive online game that blends the speed and intensity of an RTS with RPG elements. Two teams of powerful champions, each with a unique design and playstyle, battle head-to-head across multiple battlefields and game modes. With an ever-expanding roster of champions, frequent updates and a thriving tournament scene, League of Legends offers endless replayability for players of every skill level.

game.title: Stardew Valley
game.description:
Stardew Valley is an open-ended country-life RPG! 

 You've inherited your grandfather's old farm plot in Stardew Valley. Armed with hand-me-down tools and a few coins, you set out to begin your new life. Can you learn to live off the land and turn these overgrown fields into a thriving home? It won't be easy. Ever since Joja Corporation came to town, the old ways of life have all but disappeared. The community center, once the town's most vibrant hub of activity, now lies in shambles. But the valley seems full of opportunity. With a little dedication, you might just be the one to restore Stardew Valley to greatness!
 
  Features  

    Turn your overgrown field into a lively farm!    
Raise animals, grow crops, start an orchard, craft useful machines, and more! You'll have plenty of space to create the farm of your dreams. 
 
    8 Player Farming!  
Invite 1-7 players to join you in the valley online! Players can work together to build a thriving farm, share resources, and improve the local community.  As more hands are better than one, players have the option to scale profit margin on produce sold for a more challenging experience.
 
    Improve your skills over time.   
As you make your way from a struggling greenhorn to a master farmer, you'll level up in 5 different areas: farming, mining, combat, fishing, and foraging. As you progress, you'll learn new cooking and crafting recipes, unlock new areas to explore, and customize your skills by choosing from a variety of professions. 
 
    Become part of the local community.   
With over 30 unique characters living in Stardew Valley, you won't have a problem finding new friends! Each person has their own daily schedule, birthday, unique mini-cutscenes, and new things to say throughout the week and year. As you make friends with them, they will open up to you, ask you for help with their personal troubles, or tell you their secrets! Take part in seasonal festivals such as the luau, haunted maze, and feast of the winter star. 
 
    Explore a vast, mysterious cave.   
As you travel deeper underground, you'll encounter new and dangerous monsters, powerful weapons, new environments, valuable gemstones, raw materials for crafting and upgrading tools, and mysteries to be uncovered. 
 
    Breathe new life into the valley.  
Since JojaMart opened, the old way of life in Stardew Valley has changed. Much of the town's infrastructure has fallen into disrepair. Help restore Stardew Valley to it's former glory by repairing the old community center, or take the alternate route and join forces with Joja Corporation.
 
    Court and marry a partner to share your life on the farm with.   
There are 12 available bachelors and bachelorettes to woo, each with unique character progression cutscenes. Once married, your partner will live on the farm with you. Who knows, maybe you'll have kids and start a family?
 
    Spend a relaxing afternoon at one of the local fishing spots.   
The waters are teeming with seasonal varieties of delicious fish. Craft bait, bobbers, and crab pots to help you in your journey toward catching every fish and becoming a local legend! 
 
    Donate artifacts and minerals to the local museum.  
 
    Cook delicious meals and craft useful items to help you out.   
With over 100 cooking and crafting recipes, you'll have a wide variety of items to create. Some dishes you cook will even give you temporary boosts to skills, running speed, or combat prowess. Craft useful objects like scarecrows, oil makers, furnaces, or even the rare and expensive crystalarium. 
 
    Customize the appearance of your character and house.   
With hundreds of decorative items to choose from, you'll have no trouble creating the home of your dreams!
 
    Xbox controller support (with rumble)! (Keyboard still required for text input)  
 
    Over two hours of original music.

Te vas a vivir al valle...
 
 Acabas de heredar la vieja parcela agrícola de tu abuelo de Stardew Valley. Decides partir hacia una nueva vida con unas herramientas usadas y algunas monedas. ¿Te ves capaz de vivir de la tierra y convertir estos campos descuidados en un hogar próspero?
 
     ¡Crea la granja de tus sueños!  
Constrúyela desde cero en una de las cinco configuraciones del mapa.
    
 ¡Domina tu habilidad con la ganadería!  
Cría animales, siembra cultivos y fabrica maquinaria útil entre muchas más cosas.
   
  ¡Únete a la comunidad local!  
Entabla amistad con más de 30 habitantes de Pelican Town.
 
    ¡Personaliza a tu granjero!  
Podrás elegir entre cientos de opciones de personalización de personajes.
    
 ¡Instálate y empieza a formar una familia!  
Comparte tu vida en la granja con uno de los doce personajes con los que podrás tener una relación.
  
   ¡Explora grandes y misteriosas cuevas!  
Encuentra monstruos peligrosos y tesoros valiosos.

Du ziehst ins Tal ...

 Dein Großvater hat dir sein altes Farmgrundstück in Stardew Valley hinterlassen. Ausgestattet mit Werkzeugen, die ihre besten Tage hinter sich haben, und ein paar Münzen beginnst du ein neues Leben. Kannst du von dem leben, was dir das Land zu bieten hat und die überwucherten Felder zu einer blühenden Landschaft machen?
 
    Errichte die Farm deiner Träume – von Grund auf und auf einem 1 von 5 Lageplänen.

    Meistere deine Fähigkeiten als Farmer! Züchte Tiere, bewirtschafte Felder, baue nützliche Maschinen und so weiter.

    Werde Teil der örtlichen Gemeinschaft. Freunde dich mit über 30 Bewohnern von Pelican Town an.

    Passe deinen Farmer an! Hunderte von Charakteranpassungsmöglichkeiten!

    Werde sesshaft und gründe eine Familie! Lebe zusammen mit 1 von 12 Charakteren, die du daten kannst, auf deiner Farm!

    Erkunde riesige, geheimnisvolle Höhlen! Triff auf gefährliche Monster & wertvolle Schätze.

game.title: Until Then
game.description:
Mark, an average irresponsible high school student, tries to get by and find purpose in a humdrum life of scrolling, cramming, and traffic. He meets friends, both old and new, and embarks upon a seemingly never-ending trouble, until nothing is ever the same again.

Until Then is a contemporary adventure game inspired by the Philippines, its lifestyle, and culture. Featuring a smartphone where mechanics of modern living come into play, chat with your classmates and explore the depths of social networks, where your replies and interactions may pose consequences.

localized_description.text:
Mark, an average irresponsible high school student, tries to get by and find purpose in a humdrum life of scrolling, cramming, and traffic. He meets friends, both old and new, and embarks upon a seemingly never-ending trouble, until nothing is ever the same again.

Until Then is a contemporary adventure game inspired by the Philippines, its lifestyle, and culture. Featuring a smartphone where mechanics of modern living come into play, chat with your classmates and explore the depths of social networks, where your replies and interactions may pose consequences.

I en verden, der stadig er ved at komme sig efter en katastrofe, navigerer Mark Borja og hans venner glæden og elendighederne i endnu et år på gymnasiet. Vågn op i et typisk teenageværelse, øv klaver, ræs for at holde trit med lektierne, og opbyg (og brænd) forhold, mens du genmindes den daglige usikkerhed i gymnasielivet.
 
 Det vil sige indtil et skæbnesvangert møde sætter gang i en kædereaktion, der ændrer Marks liv. Folk forsvinder, og hans minder viser sig at være upålidelige. Afslør en skjult sandhed sammen med Mark og hans venner i dette berettende eventyr i kapløbet om at opklare mysteriet, før det er for sent.  Spil dit eget eventyr  Mød en mangfoldig og smertefuldt velkendt gruppe af karakterer, som du kan tale med personligt via sms og via e-mail. Lær dem at kende, opbyg relationer, dump gruppeprojekter, og se hvordan deres individuelle personlige historier udspiller sig sammen med dine.  Undersøg omgivelserne med hverdagsteknologi  Udforsk de sociale mediers dybde, hvor dine ”synes godt om” og kommentarer kan have konsekvenser. Scroll gennem sociale indlæg, e-mails, websider og mere på din smartphone i spillet, hvor du kan finde hints og ledetråde om personer og verden omkring dig. Chat med dine venner, klassekammerater og endda fremmede.  Udforsk temaer som kærlighed, tab og venskab  Tag fat på filosofiske spørgsmål som hovedperson. Lav fejl, og tag svære valg. Vil Mark være der for sine venner, når de har brug for ham, eller vil han svigte dem? Kan han hele sine sår ved at give slip på fortiden? Bestem selv, hvordan Mark vokser og stræber efter at gøre det bedre gennem historien.  Spil vanedannende banale minispil  Indsæt et flashdrev – åh vent, vender forkert  – nej, det var rigtigt første gang. Kæmp med din ven om at gafle flest fiskeboller ved madstanden udenfor. Sving til rytmen, og betal for jeepneyen. Fortab dig selv i små spil, du spiller i hverdagen.  Fordyb dig i en filmisk visuel oplevelse  Oplev en spændende fortælling, der er unikt præsenteret i iøjnefaldende håndtegnet pixelkunst, og fordyb dig i de varme farver og musik fra en verden, der forsøger at komme videre fra tragedie. Karakterer, landskaber og rekvisitter blander sig i 3D. Skygger, refleksioner og lys sætter tonen i en kærligt udformet oplevelse.  Oplev en verden inspireret af filippinske steder og kultur  Tag på en rejse gennem filippinsk-inspirerede landskaber i søgen efter sandheden – fra hjertet af den travle hovedstad til lange busture forbi græsmarker og kystbyer. Udforsk Until Then-verdenen i en fiktiv version af Filippinerne. Indvendige værelser er formet af de lokales manerer og sætter scenen for en nyere fortid.
 
  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1574820/Until_Then/?beta=0

In un mondo che si sta ancora riprendendo dalla catastrofe, Mark Borja e i suoi amici vivono le gioie e i dolori di un altro anno di scuola superiore. Svegliati in una classica cameretta da adolescente, esercitati al pianoforte, affannati per rispettare le scadenze scolastiche e costruisci (e distruggi) relazioni, abbandonandoti ai ricordi delle insicurezze quotidiane che caratterizzano il periodo delle superiori.
 
 Ma poi, un incontro fatidico mette in moto una serie di eventi che sconvolge la vita di Mark. Le persone scompaiono, i ricordi diventano inaffidabili. Scopri una verità celata con Mark e i suoi amici in questa avventura narrativa in cui le tue scelte hanno conseguenze. Sbrigati, prima che sia troppo tardi.  Definisci la tua avventura grazie ai dialoghi  Scopri un variegato cast di personaggi fortemente familiari con cui conversare di persona, per messaggio o per e-mail. Il modo in cui decidi di interagire (o di non interagire) può influenzare le relazioni, influire sul risultato di alcuni progetti, provocare situazioni inaspettate o addirittura essere determinante per il finale del gioco.  Esplora l'ambientazione grazie alla tecnologia di tutti i giorni  Esplora in profondità i social network, dove i tuoi Mi piace e commenti potrebbero avere delle conseguenze. Scorri post sui social, e-mail, pagine web e molto altro sul tuo smartphone all'interno del gioco: potresti scoprire informazioni e indizi sulle persone e sul mondo intorno a te.  Esplora i temi dell'amore, della perdita e dell'amicizia  Affronta questioni filosofiche nei panni del personaggio principale. Commetti errori e prendi decisioni difficili. Mark riuscirà a sostenere i suoi amici e a essere presente per loro quando necessario, o li deluderà? Riuscirà a far guarire le sue ferite, lasciando andare il passato? Decidi in che modo Mark dovrà crescere e adoperarsi per migliorare nel corso della storia.  Gioca a minigiochi ordinari che creano dipendenza  Inserisci una chiavetta USB... Aspetta, è al contrario! Ah no, era giusta prima. Combatti con i tuoi amici per ottenere più polpette di pesce alla bancarella all'aperto. Fai del tuo meglio in modo da poter pagare il jeepney. Perditi tra i giochi con cui ti trovi a giocare nella vita di tutti i giorni.  Immergiti in un'esperienza visiva cinematografica  Scopri a una modalità narrativa unica, presentata attraverso una pixel art creata a mano che cattura l'attenzione, e immergiti nei colori caldi e nella musica di un mondo che cerca di superare una tragedia. I personaggi, i paesaggi e gli oggetti si amalgamano in 3D. Ombre, riflessi e luci determinano il tono di un'esperienza creata con cura.  Scopri un mondo ispirato ai luoghi e alla cultura delle Filippine  Attraversa paesaggi ispirati alle Filippine in cerca della verità. Dal cuore della capitale trafficata alle lunghe corse in autobus attraverso campi erbosi e cittadine costiere, esplora il mondo di Until Then, ambientato in una versione fittizia delle Filippine. Gli spazi interni sono plasmati dai modi di fare della gente del posto, ponendo gli avvenimenti in un passato recente.
 
  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1574820/Until_Then/?beta=0

在一个灾难后重建中的世界，马克·博尔哈和他的朋友们在高中又度过了欢乐与烦恼的一年。他每天在一间再普通不过的青少年的卧室中醒来，练习钢琴，争分夺秒地完成作业，维护（同时破坏）人际关系……他的高中生活就像你回忆中的那样每天充满各种不安定的感觉。
 
 直到一次宿命的会面引发了连锁反应，将马克的生活搅得天翻地覆。人们接连失踪，而记忆也变得不再可靠。在这场叙事冒险中，你将与马克和他的朋友们一起揭开隐藏的真相，并在世界末日来临之前争分夺秒解开谜团。  演绎自己的冒险  认识各种各样熟悉的游戏角色，与他们当面交谈，或是通过短信和电子邮件交流。了解他们，联络关系，完成小组作业，让他们的个人故事与你的人生经历一同展开。  通过日常生活中的工具深入故事  深入探索社交媒体，你的点赞和评论可能会带来不同的后果。使用游戏中的智能手机浏览帖子、电子邮件和网页等，你可能会从中发现周围人群和世界的相关提示与线索。记得多与朋友、同学甚至陌生人聊天。  探索爱、失去和友谊  扮演主角，应对有哲学意味的问题。你可能会犯错，也需要面对艰难的选择。马克会让朋友失望，还是会为朋友挺身而出，在他们需要的时候陪伴左右？他能否放下过去，治愈创伤？你将在整个故事中决定马克的成长，并努力让自己做得更好。  令人着迷的小游戏  插入 U 盘。等等，插反了。不对，第一次才是对的。在外面的小吃摊上与朋友争抢更多鱼丸。边支付公交车钱边打节拍。快来畅玩各种日常小游戏中吧。  电影般的视觉体验  观看以优美手绘像素风呈现的独特叙事世界，沉浸在暖色调的画面和优美的音乐氛围中，试着走出悲剧。 人物、风景和道具完美融入 3D 场景。精心打造的阴影、倒影和光线奠定了独特的游戏基调。  体验以菲律宾景点与文化为灵感打造的世界  在寻找真相的同时感受以菲律宾为灵感制作的风光场景。从熙熙攘攘的首都中心到穿过草场和滨海小镇的长途巴士，探索以虚构的菲律宾为背景的游戏世界。室内空间反映了当地的风土人情，塑造出充满近代感的场景设定。
 
  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1574820/Until_Then/?beta=0

「在一個正在從災難恢復的世界中，馬克•博爾哈和他的好友們迎來了另一個喜悅與煩惱交織的高中學年。和你回憶裡的高中日常一樣，他每天都會在有著典型青少年風格的臥室中醒來，練鋼琴，趕作業，建立（或斷送）人際關係，日子就這樣在忐忑的心情中一天天過去。
 
 直到有一天，一場命運的相遇引發了連鎖反應，徹底顛覆了馬克的生活。人們接連消失，記憶也變得不再可靠。在這款敘事冒險遊戲中，你將與馬克還有他的好友們一同與時間賽跑，趕在一切無可挽回前揭開謎團的真相。  玩出屬於你自己的冒險  透過簡訊、郵件或會面方式與一眾性格各異而又似曾相似的角色互動。了解他們，與他們建立關係，一起在團體作業中不及格，並看著他們各自的故事與你的故事在交織中展開。  透過日常科技調查遊戲場景  深入探索社交媒體的世界，你的點讚和評論可能會有遠大的後果。使用遊戲內的智慧手機瀏覽社交媒體貼文、郵件、網頁等內容，並從中發現與周圍的人及世界有關的線索。此外你還可以與好友、同學，甚至是陌生人聊天。  探索與愛、失去以及友誼  操控主角應對各種哲學問題。犯錯以及做出艱難決定。在朋友需要幫助時，馬克會挺身而出嗎？還是會讓他們大失所望？他能否放下過去，讓舊傷癒合？在整個故事中，馬克將如何成長，能否做出更好的表現，一切由你來決定。  暢玩平凡卻能令人上癮的小遊戲  插入一個隨身碟——等等，方向反了——不對，一開始就是對的。在外面的小吃攤和好友爭奪魚丸。用你的音感交換吉普尼的車票。讓自己沉浸在日常生活的小遊戲之中。  沉浸於電影般的視覺體驗  遊戲採用別致的手繪像素藝術，以獨特方式為你呈現了有趣的敘事。在這個正努力從悲劇陰霾中走出來的世界中，體驗令你感到溫暖的色彩和音樂。遊戲中的角色、景觀和道具與3D風格完美地混合。從遊戲運用的陰影、反射和光照效果中，你可以體驗到遊戲的精良製作。  感受一個以菲律賓地方特色和文化為靈感創造的世界  穿越以菲律賓景觀為靈感打造的世界，並在其中找尋真相。從繁華首都的市中心到長途巴士沿途的草原和海濱城鎮，探索《Until Then》中以虛構版菲律賓為背景的世界。室內空間參照當地風土人情而設計，場景設定在不久前的過去。」
 
  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1574820/Until_Then/?beta=0

En un mundo que aún se recupera de una catástrofe, Mark Borja y sus amigos navegan por las alegrías y penas de otro año de instituto. Despiértate en la típica habitación de adolescente, ensaya con el piano, date prisa para entregar los deberes a tiempo y desarrolla (y quema) relaciones, mientras rememoras las inseguridades diarias de la vida en el instituto. 
 
 Hasta que un fatídico encuentro desencadena una reacción en cadena que pone patas arriba la vida de Mark. La gente desaparece y los recuerdos resultan poco fiables. Descubre una verdad oculta con Mark y sus amigos en esta aventura centrada en la narrativa en la que tus elecciones pueden tener consecuencias y apresúrate para desvelar el misterio antes de que sea demasiado tarde.  Elige tu propia aventura a través del diálogo  Conoce a un variado y fastidiosamente familiar elenco de personajes con los que podrás hablar en persona, por chat o por correo electrónico. La forma en que elijas interactuar (o no interactuar) puede influir en las relaciones, afectar a los resultados del proyecto, generar situaciones inesperadas o incluso determinar el final del juego.  Investiga el escenario a través de la tecnología cotidiana  Explora las profundidades de las redes sociales, donde tus ""me gusta"" y comentarios pueden tener consecuencias. Desplázate por publicaciones sociales, correos electrónicos, páginas web y mucho más en tu móvil del juego, donde podrás descubrir pistas sobre la gente y el mundo que te rodea. Chatea con tus amigos, compañeros e incluso desconocidos.  Explora temas como el amor, la pérdida y la amistad  Enfréntate a cuestiones filosóficas como el protagonista. Comete errores y toma decisiones difíciles. ¿Dará Mark la cara por sus amigos y estará ahí cuando le necesiten o les decepcionará? ¿Podrá curar sus heridas dejando atrás el pasado? Decide por ti cómo Mark crece y se esfuerza por ser mejor a lo largo de la historia.  Minijuegos adictivos y mundanos  Inserta un pendrive... oh, espera, no, la primera vez estaba bien. Pelea con tu amigo por más bolas de pescado en el puesto de comida de fuera. Ponte en marcha para pagar el yipni. Piérdete en pequeños juegos de la vida cotidiana.  Sumérgete en una experiencia visual cinematográfica  Presencia una intrigante narrativa presentada de forma única con un llamativo pixel art dibujado a mano y zambúllete los cálidos colores y la música de un mundo que intenta superar la tragedia.  Los personajes, los paisajes y el escenario se mezclan en 3D. Las sombras, los reflejos y la iluminación marcan el tono de una experiencia creada con mucho mimo.  Disfruta de un mundo inspirado en la cultura y ubicaciones filipinas  Recorre paisajes inspirados en Filipinas en busca de la verdad. Desde el corazón de la bulliciosa capital hasta largos viajes en autobús por campos de hierba y pueblos costeros. explora el mundo de Until Then ambientado en una versión ficticia de Filipinas. Los espacios interiores están moldeados por los gestos de los lugareños, que ambientan un pasado reciente.
 
  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1574820/Until_Then/?beta=0

Dans un monde qui se remet à peine d’une catastrophe, Mark Borja et ses amis traversent les joies et les malheurs d’une nouvelle année au lycée. Réveillez-vous dans une chambre d’adolescent typique, pratiquez le piano, faites vos devoirs à temps et nouez (ou rompez) des relations tout vous remémorant les tracas quotidiens de la vie au lycée.
 
 Du moins, jusqu’à ce qu’une rencontre fatidique déclenche une réaction en chaîne qui bouleverse la vie de Mark. Des gens disparaissent et des souvenirs s’avèrent peu fiables. Découvrez la vérité avec Mark et ses amis dans cette aventure narrative où vos choix peuvent avoir des répercussions et dépêchez-vous de percer le mystère avant qu’il ne soit trop tard.  Choisissez votre propre aventure grâce au dialogue  Rencontrez une série de personnages variés et douloureusement familiers avec lesquels vous pouvez échanger en personne, par SMS et par e-mail. Votre manière d’interagir (ou de ne pas le faire) peut influencer vos relations, affecter les résultats de projets, générer des situations inattendues ou même déterminer la fin du jeu.  Enquêtez sur le cadre de jeu grâce à des technologies de tous les jours  Explorez les profondeurs des médias sociaux où vos likes et vos commentaires peuvent avoir des conséquences. Faites défiler les messages sociaux, les e-mails, les pages Web et plus encore sur votre smartphone en jeu, où vous pourriez découvrir des indices sur le monde et sur les gens qui vous entourent. Discutez avec vos amis, vos camarades de classe et même avec des étrangers.  Explorez les thèmes de l’amour, du deuil et de l’amitié  Abordez des questions philosophiques en tant que personnage principal. Faites des erreurs et des choix difficiles. Mark défendra-t-il ses amis et sera-t-il là pour eux quand ils en ont besoin ou les laissera-t-il tomber ? Peut-il guérir ses blessures en laissant le passé derrière lui ? Décidez vous-même comment Mark évoluera et s’efforcera de mieux faire tout au long de l’histoire.  Jouez à des mini-jeux addictifs et ordinaires  Insérez une clé USB — oh non, elle est dans le mauvais sens — ah non, c’était bien la première fois. Combattez votre ami pour plus de boulettes de poisson au stand de nourriture dehors. Suivez le groove pour payer le jeepney. Perdez-vous dans de petits jeux de la vie de tous les jours.  Plongez dans une expérience visuelle cinématographique  Vivez un récit intrigant présenté de manière unique en pixel art dessiné à la main et plongez dans les couleurs chaudes et la musique d’un monde qui cherche à dépasser la tragédie. Les personnages, les paysages et les accessoires se mélangent en 3D. Les ombres, les reflets et les effets de lumière donnent le ton d’une expérience élaborée avec amour.  Découvrez un monde inspiré par les lieux et la civilisation philippine  Traversez des paysages d’inspiration philippine à la recherche de la vérité. Depuis le cœur de la capitale animée jusqu’à de longs trajets en bus à travers des champs et des villes côtières, explorez le monde de Until Then dans une version fictive des Philippines. Les espaces intérieurs sont façonnés par les maniérismes des habitants, dépeignant un passé récent.
 
  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1574820/Until_Then/?beta=0

In einer Welt, die sich von einer Katastrophe erholt, erleben Mark Borja und seine Freunde die Freuden und Leiden eines Schuljahrs an der High School. Wache in einem typischen Schlafzimmer eines Teenagers auf, übe Klavierspielen, beeile dich mit deinen Hausaufgaben, baue Beziehungen auf (und vermassle sie wieder), während du dich an die täglichen Unsicherheiten im High School-Alltag erinnerst. 
 
 Jedenfalls bis eine schicksalshafte Begegnung eine Kettenreaktion auslöst und Marks Leben völlig umkrempelt. Menschen verschwinden und Erinnerungen erweisen sich als unzuverlässig. Decke in diesem narrativen Abenteuer, wo deine Entscheidungen Folgen haben, mit Mark und seinen Freunden ein Geheimnis auf, bevor es zu spät ist.  Wähle deine eigenen Abenteuer durch Dialog  Lerne die abwechslungsreiche und schmerzhaft vertraute Besetzung kennen, mit denen du persönlich, per SMS oder per E-Mail kommunizieren kannst. Wie du interagierst (oder nicht interagierst), kann Beziehungen beeinflussen, sich auf die Ergebnisse von Projekten auswirken und unerwartete Situationen entstehen lassen oder sogar den Ausgang des Spiels bestimmen.  Untersuche den Schauplatz mithilfe von vertrauter Technologie  Erkunde die Tiefen der sozialen Medien, wo deine Likes und Kommentare Folgen haben können. Scrolle durch soziale Beiträge, E-Mails, Webseiten und mehr auf deinem Spiel-Smartphone. Hier kannst du möglicherweise Hinweise über die Leute und deine Umgebung finden. Chatte mit deinen Freunden, Klassenkameraden und selbst Fremden.  Erkunde Themen wie Liebe, Verlust und Freundschaft  Beschäftige dich als Hauptfigur mit philosophischen Fragen. Mach Fehler und treffe schwere Entscheidungen. Wird Mark seinen Freunden in der Not zur Seite stehen oder wird er sie enttäuschen? Kann er seine eigenen Wunden heilen, indem er die Vergangenheit hinter sich lässt? Entscheide selbst, wie sich Mark weiterentwickelt und im Verlauf der Geschichte versucht, sich zu verbessern.  Spiele spannende alltägliche Minispiele  Stecke ein Flash-Laufwerk ein – ach nein, falsch herum – nein, war beim ersten Mal richtig. Raufe dich mit deinen Freunden um mehr Fischklöpse am Imbissstand im Freien. Rocke ab, um für den Jeepney zu zahlen. Verliere dich in Minispielen, die du im Alltag spielen kannst  Tauche ein in ein Kinoerlebnis  Erlebe eine spannende Narrative, die in atemberaubender, handgezeichneter Pixel-Kunst präsentiert wird und tauche ein in die warmen Farben und Musik einer Welt, die versucht, eine Tragödie hinter sich zu lassen.  Figuren, Landschaften und Requisiten passen in 3D zusammen. Schatten, Spiegelungen und Beleuchtung sorgen für die Stimmung in diesem liebevoll gestalteten Erlebnis.  Erlebe eine Welt, die von Schauplätzen und der Kultur in den Philippinen inspiriert wurde  Begib dich durch von den Philippinen inspirierte Landschaften auf der Suche nach der Wahrheit. Tauche ein ins Herz der pulsierenden Hauptstadt, oder mach dich auf lange Busreisen vorbei an Wiesen und Küstenstädten. Erkunde die Welt von Until Then, die in einer fiktionalen Version der Philippinen spielt. Die Innenräume werden vom Verhalten der Ortsansässigen bestimmt, die die Szene für die jüngste Vergangenheit setzen.
 
  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1574820/Until_Then/?beta=0

Num mundo a recuperar de uma catástrofe, Mark Borja e os seus amigos exploram todas as alegrias e desilusões de mais um ano na escola secundária. Acorda num quarto de um adolescente, toca piano, faz trabalhos de casa, constrói (e destrói) relacionamentos e enfrenta as inseguranças da vida no secundário. 
 
 Até que um encontro fatídico dá origem a uma reação em cadeia que vira a vida de Mark do avesso. Algumas pessoas desaparecem e recordações ficam difusas. Desvenda a verdade na companhia de Mark e dos seus amigos nesta aventura e descobre o grande mistério antes que seja demasiado tarde.  Cria a tua aventura  Conhece personagens diversas e familiares, e conversa pessoalmente, por chat ou e-mail. Conhece-as melhor, constrói relacionamentos, enfrenta problemas de trabalhos em grupo e descobre como as histórias de cada personagem progridem a par com a tua vida.  Investiga cenários com a ajuda de tecnologias do quotidiano  Explora as profundezas das redes sociais, onde os teus gostos e comentários têm consequências. Navega em publicações de redes sociais, e-mails ou sites no telemóvel do protagonista e descobre dicas e pistas sobre outras pessoas e o mundo que te rodeia. Conversa com amigos, colegas de turma e desconhecidos.  Explora os temas do amor, perda e amizade  Enfrenta questões filosóficas no papel do protagonista. Comete erros e toma decisões difíceis. Será que o Mark vai apoiar os seus amigos quando mais precisam ou desiludi-los? Será capaz de esquecer o passado para recuperar forças para o presente? Só tu podes decidir como o Mark vai enfrentar todos os problemas durante a história.  Joga minijogos semelhantes aos que já conheces  Liga na entrada USB... Espera, é ao contrário. Não, afinal estava bem! Desafia o teu amigo para ver quem come mais bolas de peixe na rulote. Entra no ritmo para pagar o jeepney, um veículo típico das Filipinas. Explora pequenos jogos, semelhantes ao que já conheces.  Explora uma experiência visual ao estilo cinematográfico  Explora uma narrativa intrigante, criada com pixel art desenhada à mão, e descobre um mundo repleto de cores quentes e com uma banda sonora que acompanha um mundo a recuperar de uma tragédia.  As personagens, cenários e objetos combinam entre si num mundo 3D. As sombras, reflexos e a iluminação marcam o tom de uma experiência deslumbrante.  Descobre um mundo inspirado na cultura e em locais das Filipinas  Explora cenários inspirados nas Filipinas em busca da verdade. Desde a baixa movimentada da capital até longas viagens de autocarro por zonas rurais e vilas junto ao mar, terás de explorar o mundo de Until Then, inspirado nas Filipinas. Os espaços interiores são completamente inspirados pelos maneirismos dos habitantes locais e dão pistas sobre um passado recente.
 
  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1574820/Until_Then/?beta=0

「舞台は大災害から復興中の世界。マーク・ボルハとその友人たちは、今年も高校生活の楽しみと苦悩の波を乗り越えていく。君はティーンエージャーっぽい寝室で目覚め、ピアノの練習をし、宿題提出の締め切りに追われ、交友関係を築き（そして壊し）ながら、不安の入り混じった高校生活を回想する。
 
 しかしそのような日常は、ある運命的な出会いによって連鎖反応が引き起こされ、マークの人生は根底から覆されてしまう。人々が姿を消し、記憶がおぼろげになっていく。この冒険物語でマークと彼の友人たちと一緒に隠された真実を追及し、手遅れになる前に急いで謎を解き明かそう。  自分の冒険を展開しよう  個性豊かで親しみやすい様々なキャラクターたちと出会い、直接交流したり、メールやメッセージを送り合ったりしよう。知り合いになり親睦を深め、グループプロジェクトに落第し、他のキャラそれぞれの物語が君の物語と共にどのように展開していくか見届けよう。  日常感あふれるテクノロジーによる設定を探求しよう  君の「いいね！」やコメントが物語の展開に影響を及ぼすソーシャルメディアの深みを覗いてみよう。ゲーム内のスマートフォンでSNSの投稿、メール、ウェブページなどをスクロールしていくと、君を取り巻く人々や世界に関するヒントや手がかりが見つかるかもしれない。友だちやクラスメイトや見知らぬ人ともチャットしてみよう。  愛、喪失、そして友情のテーマを模索しよう  君は主人公として哲学的な問題に直面する。過ちを犯し、苦渋の選択をしよう。マークは友だちのために立ち上がり、必要とされている時にそばにいてあげられるだろうか？それとも、友だちを失望させてしまうのだろうか？マークは過去を手放すことで、心の傷を癒すことができるだろうか？物語を通してマークがどのように成長するかは、君の選択で決まる。  やり出したら止まらなくなる、日常を描いたミニゲームで遊ぼう  フラッシュドライブを挿入しよう。いや、そうじゃないって…あれ？最初のやり方で合ってたみたいだ…外の屋台で友だちと競い合って魚肉ミートボールをもっとたくさん取得したり、ノリノリにジープニーの乗車代を稼いだりする日常の一コマが凝縮されたミニゲームに没頭しよう。  シネマ的なビジュアル体験を堪能しよう  魅力的な手描きのピクセルアートで表現される物語を進めながら、悲劇から立ち直ろうとする世界の温かみのある色彩と音楽に浸ろう。キャラクターと風景とプロップが3Dで見事に融合されている、影と反射と照明により、美しく作り出された世界を楽しもう。  フィリピンのロケーションと文化から発想を得て作られた世界を体験しよう  真実を求め、フィリピンから発想を得て作られた世界で旅をしよう。首都の賑やかな中心部から草原や海岸沿いの町をバスで走り抜ける長旅まで、フィリピンの架空の世界を舞台にした『Until Then』の世界を探検しよう。屋内の空間は地元の人々が醸す雰囲気によって形作られ、そう遠くない過去の情景という設定になっている。」
 
  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1574820/Until_Then/?beta=0

game.brief:
Mark, an average irresponsible high school student, tries to get by and find purpose in a humdrum life of scrolling, cramming, and traffic. He meets friends, both old and new, and embarks upon a seemingly never-ending trouble, until nothing is ever the same again.

Until Then is a contemporary adventure game inspired by the Philippines, its lifestyle, and culture. Featuring a smartphone where mechanics of modern living come into play, chat with your classmates and explore the depths of social networks, where your replies and interactions may pose consequences.

game.title: Kentucky Route Zero: TV Edition
game.description:
Kentucky Route Zero is a magical realist adventure game about a secret highway in the caves beneath Kentucky, and the mysterious folks who travel it. Gameplay is inspired by point-and-click adventure games (like the classic Monkey Island or King's Quest series, or more recently Telltale's Walking Dead series), but focused on characterization, atmosphere and storytelling rather than clever puzzles or challenges of skill.

The game is developed by Cardboard Computer (Jake Elliott, Tamas Kemenczy, and Ben Babbitt), and features an original electronic score by Ben Babbitt along with a suite of old hymns & bluegrass standards recorded by The Bedquilt Ramblers.

game.title: Monument Valley III
game.description:
Begin a thrilling new voyage into an enchanting puzzle world. Navigate optical illusions to bring together a village and guide them to a new home.

Set sail for adventure in this new installment of the award-winning Monument Valley game series, exploring an expansive and beautiful world of puzzles. When an apprentice lightkeeper named Noor discovers that the world's light is fading — and waters rising — she must go on a quest to find a new source of power before her community is lost to the waves forever.

game.title: Slay the Princess
game.description:
You're here to slay the princess. Don't believe her lies.

Slay the Princess is a choice-driven psychological horror visual novel with dramatic branching, light RPG elements, and hand-penciled art.

You're on a path in the woods, and at the end of that path is a cabin. And in the basement of that cabin is a Princess.

You're here to slay her. If you don't, it will be the end of the world.

She will do everything in her power to stop you. She'll charm, and she'll lie, and she'll promise you the world, and if you let her, she'll kill you a dozen times over. You can't let that happen. Don't forget, the fate of the world rests on your shoulders.

... don't you trust me?

You're on a path in the woods, and at the end of that path is a cabin. And in the basement of that cabin is a Princess.

You're here to slay her. If you don't, it will be the end of the world.

She will do everything in her power to stop you. She'll charm, and she'll lie, and she'll promise you the world, and if you let her, she'll kill you a dozen times over. You can't let that happen. Don't forget, the fate of the world rests on your shoulders.

... don't you trust me?

game.brief:
You're here to slay the princess. Don't believe her lies.

Slay the Princess is a choice-driven psychological horror visual novel with dramatic branching, light RPG elements, and hand-penciled art.

You're on a path in the woods, and at the end of that path is a cabin. And in the basement of that cabin is a Princess.

You're here to slay her. If you don't, it will be the end of the world.

She will do everything in her power to stop you. She'll charm, and she'll lie, and she'll promise you the world, and if you let her, she'll kill you a dozen times over. You can't let that happen. Don't forget, the fate of the world rests on your shoulders.

... don't you trust me?

game.title: Beyond: Two Souls
game.description: 2013 video game developed by Quantic Dream

localized_description.text: 由Elliot Page和Willem Dafoe带来的好莱坞顶级表演，《超凡双生》将把您带入一场横跨全球的惊悚之旅，体验Jodie Holmes的非凡人生。
2013年電子遊戲
2013年的電玩遊戲
2013 video game developed by Quantic Dream
videojuego de 2013
jeu vidéo de 2013
Computerspiel aus dem Jahr 2013
jogo eletrônico de 2013 desenvolvido pela Quantic Dream
クアンティック・ドリームによって開発された2013年のアクションアドベンチャーゲーム

A unique psychological action thriller delivered by A-list Hollywood performances by Elliot Page and Willem Dafoe, Beyond: Two Souls takes you on a thrilling journey across the globe as you play out the remarkable life of Jodie Holmes.

Experience the most striking moments throughout 15 years of Jodie’s life as she grows from a confused child into a crack CIA agent, and discovers who she really is. As she traverses the globe, Jodie will face incredible challenges set against a backdrop of emotionally-charged events never before seen in a video game. Create your own personal journey as your decisions and actions shape the course of the story.
PS3超强互动电影游戏《暴雨》开发商QD的新作《超凡双生（Beyond Two Souls）》日前曝光首批细节，该作将继续探索动作捕捉与多线剧情的最高境界，同时来自《盗梦空间》的萝莉“Ellen Page”确认加盟本作，扮演女一号。

Triple-A talent and storytelling brings you a video game experience like you’ve never had before. LIVE AN EXTRAORDINARY LIFE: ONE LIFE, TWO SOULS    
 A unique psychological action thriller delivered by A-list Hollywood performances by  Elliot Page  and  Willem Dafoe ,  Beyond: Two Souls™  takes you on a thrilling journey across the globe as you play out the remarkable life of Jodie Holmes.
 
 Born with a connection to a mysterious entity with incredible powers, Jodie is different.
 
 Your actions will determine Jodie's fate as she faces extraordinary challenges, danger, and heart-wrenching loss on a journey to discover the truth of who she is.
 
 Create an action-packed story through your choices and actions as you live her life – a girl born with a link to a supernatural entity called Aiden.
 
 By playing as both Jodie and Aiden, you will face spectacular physical and psychological challenges to understand what truly lies… beyond.
 
     TEST YOUR SKILLS WITH ‘ADVANCED EXPERIMENTS’ The original DLC mission from the PlayStation™ releases is included in the full PC game. The entire game is playable in two difficulty modes, and in Solo or Duo mode. PLAY THE STORY THE WAY YOU WANT Cinematic or chronological order? Select the way you want to experience the story, and even play in local co-op mode using two different controllers for each player – one to play as Jodie and the other to play as Aiden. Play the way you want to play. FULLY OPTIMIZED FOR PC Beyond: Two Souls is brought to PC with stunning visuals including 4K resolution, widescreen 21:9 compatibility, and 60 fps framerate.

Talento y narrativa de la mayor calidad dan lugar a una experiencia de juego como jamás has vivido. VIVE UNA VIDA EXTRAORDINARIA: UNA VIDA, DOS ALMAS    
  Beyond: Two Souls™  es una historia psicológica de acción y suspense que cuenta con las actuaciones de las estrellas de Hollywood  Elliot Page  y  Willem Dafoe . Te embarcarás en un viaje trepidante alrededor del mundo, al jugar la extraordinaria vida de Jodie Holmes.
 
 Jodie es distinta: ha nacido con una conexión con una misteriosa entidad de increíbles poderes.
 
 Tus acciones determinarán el destino de Jodie conforme se enfrenta a peligros, pérdidas desgarradoras y desafíos extraordinarios en un viaje en busca de la verdad acerca de quién es.
 
 Genera una historia cargada de acción por medio de tus acciones y elecciones mientras vives la vida de una niña nacida con un vínculo con una entidad sobrenatural llamada Aiden.
 
 Al jugar como Jodie y Aiden te enfrentarás a espectaculares desafíos físicos y psicológicos para entender qué hay... más allá.
     PON A PRUEBA TUS HABILIDADES CON 'EXPERIMENTOS AVANZADOS' La versión completa de PC incluye la misión descargable original de la versión de PlayStation™. El juego completo tiene dos niveles de dificultad y modalidades de juego en solitario y dual. JUEGA LA HISTORIA A TU MANERA ¿Orden cinemático o cronológico? Escoge el modo en que prefieres experimentar la historia, e incluso juega en modo cooperativo local usando un mando para cada jugador: uno para manejar a Jodie y otro para jugar como Aiden. Juega como prefieras. TOTALMENTE OPTIMIZADO PARA PC Beyond: Two Souls llega a PC con impresionantes gráficos que incluyen resolución en 4K, compatibilidad con pantalla ancha 21:9 y una tasa de fotogramas de 60 FPS.

Des acteurs et un scénario de haute volée pour une expérience narrative inédite. VIVEZ UNE VIE EXTRAORDINAIRE : UNE VIE, DEUX ÂMES    
 Thriller psychologique unique et rempli d'action mettant en scène les acteurs  Elliot PAGE  et  Willem DAFOE ,  Beyond: Two Souls™  vous embarque dans une aventure passionnante à travers le monde, en immersion dans l'incroyable vie de Jodie Holmes.
 
 Jodie n'est pas une jeune femme comme les autres, elle est liée à une mystérieuse et puissante entité depuis sa naissance.
 
 Ce sont vos actions qui détermineront le destin de Jodie, qui devra faire face à des défis extraordinaires, des situations périlleuses et des pertes déchirantes au cours de cette quête pour découvrir la vérité sur son identité.
 
 Créez une histoire pleine d'action, en immersion dans la vie d'une jeune femme dont le destin est lié à celui d'une entité surnaturelle nommée Aiden.
 En incarnant à la fois Jodie et Aiden, vous devrez relever des défis physiques et psychologiques spectaculaires pour comprendre ce lien qui les unit.
     REPOUSSEZ VOS LIMITES AVEC "ADVANCED EXPERIMENTS" Le DLC original des versions PlayStation™ est compris dans la version PC. Vous pouvez jouer avec deux niveaux de difficulté différents, ainsi qu'en mode Solo ou Duo. JOUEZ SELON VOS ENVIES Ordre cinématique ou chronologique ? Choisissez la façon dont vous voulez vivre cette expérience... Vous pouvez même jouer en mode co-op local avec des manettes différentes pour chaque joueur : l'un peut incarner Jodie et l'autre Aiden. Jouez comme vous le souhaitez. OPTIMISÉ POUR PC Beyond: Two Souls est maintenant disponible sur PC avec des graphismes incroyables, une résolution 4K, une compatibilité écran 21:9 et un débit de 60 FPS.

Hochkarätige Talente und Erzählkunst sorgen für ein unvergleichliches Videospielerlebnis. LEBEN SIE EIN AUSSERORDENTLICHES LEBEN: EIN LEBEN, ZWEI SEELEN    
 Ein einzigartiger psychologischer Action-Thriller mit Auftritten der Hollywood-Größen  Elliot Page  und  Willem Dafoe .  Beyond: Two Souls™  nimmt Sie mit auf eine aufregende Reise rund um den Globus, auf der Sie das bemerkenswerte Leben von Jodie Holmes nachspielen.
 
 Jodie wurde mit einer Verbindung zu einem mysteriösen Wesen mit unglaublichen Kräften geboren. Jodie ist anders.
 
 Ihr Handeln wird Jodies Schicksal bestimmen, wenn sie sich auf ihrer Reise zur Entdeckung ihrer wahren Identität außergewöhnlichen Herausforderungen, Gefahren und herzzerreißenden Verlusten stellen muss.
 
 Erschaffen Sie durch Ihre Entscheidungen und Handlungen eine actiongeladene Geschichte – und leben Sie das Leben eines Mädchens, das mit einer Verbindung zu dem übernatürlichen Wesen Aiden geboren wurde.
 
 Indem Sie sowohl als Jodie als auch als Aiden spielen, werden Sie mit spektakulären physischen und psychologischen Herausforderungen konfrontiert, durch die zu verstehen, was wirklich dahinter verborgen liegt ...
 
     TESTEN SIE IHRE FÄHIGKEITEN MIT 'ADVANCED EXPERIMENTS' Die ursprüngliche DLC-Mission der PlayStation™ Versionen ist im vollständigen PC-Spiel enthalten. Das gesamte Spiel ist in zwei Schwierigkeitsmodi spielbar – Solo oder im Duo-Modus. SPIELEN SIE DIE GESCHICHTE, DIE SIE SPIELEN WOLLEN Filmische oder chronologische Reihenfolge? Entscheiden Sie, wie Sie die Geschichte erleben möchten. Sie können sogar im lokalen Co-op-Modus mit zwei verschiedenen Controllern für jeden Spieler spielen – einen für Jodie und den anderen für Aiden. Spielen Sie so, wie Sie spielen möchten. VOLLSTÄNDIG FÜR PC OPTIMIERT Beyond: Two Souls erscheint auf dem PC mit atemberaubender Grafik, einschließlich 4K-Auflösung, 21:9-Breitbildkompatibilität und 60 fps Framerate.

O talento e narrativa de grande nível trazem-te uma experiência com um videojogo como nunca antes tiveste. VIVE UMA VIDA EXTRAORDINÁRIA: UMA VIDA, DUAS ALMAS    
 Um thriller de ação psicológico apresentado com atuações dos grandes atores de Hollywood  Elliot Page  e  Willem Dafoe ,  Beyond: Two Souls™  leva-te numa viagem emocionante por todo o mundo, enquanto desvendas a vida extraordinária de Jodie Holmes.
 
 A Jodie é diferente, nasceu com uma ligação com uma entidade misteriosa com poderes incríveis.
 
 As tuas ações vão determinar o destino de Jodie enquanto ela enfrenta desafios extraordinários, perigos e perdas de partir o coração numa viagem para descobrir a verdade sobre quem ela é.
 
 Cria uma história cheia de ação através das tuas escolhas e atos enquanto vives a sua vida - uma rapariga que nasceu com uma ligação com uma entidade sobrenatural chamada Aiden.
 
 Ao jogares como a Jodie e o Aiden, vais enfrentar desafios físicos e psicológicos espetaculares para compreender o que realmente está... além.
     TESTA AS TUAS HABILIDADES COM "EXPERIÊNCIAS AVANÇADAS" A missão original de DLC dos lançamentos para PlayStation™ está incluída no jogo completo para PC. Podes jogar todo o jogo em dois modos de dificuldade e nos modos Solo ou Duo. JOGA A HISTÓRIA COMO QUISERES Em ordem cinemática ou cronológica? Escolhe a forma como queres viver a história e joga até em modo cooperativo local, com dois comandos diferentes para cada jogador - um para jogar como a Jodie e o outro para jogar como o Aiden. Joga à tua maneira. COMPLETAMENTE OTIMIZADO PARA PC Beyond: Two Souls chega aos PCs com visuais deslumbrantes que incluem a resolução 4K, compatível com monitores ultrawide 21:9 e de 60 fotogramas por segundo.

De største talenter og den bedste historiefortælling bringer dig en videospiloplevelse, som du aldrig har haft før. LEV ET EKSTRAORDINÆRT LIV: ET LIV, TO SJÆLE    
 En unik psykologisk action-thriller, der leveres af de berømte Hollywood-skuespillere  Elliot Page  og  Willem Dafoe ,  Beyond: Two Souls™  tager dig med på en spændende rejse over hele kloden, mens du udspiller Jodie Holmes' utrolige liv.
 
 Jodie er ikke som de andre. Hun er født med en forbindelse til en mystisk enhed med utrolige kræfter.
 
 Dine handlinger afgør Jodies skæbne, idet hun står over for ekstraordinære udfordringer, farer og fortvivlende tab på en rejse for at opdage sandheden om, hvem hun er.
 
 Skab en actionfyldt historie gennem dine valg og handlinger, mens du lever hendes liv - en pige, født med en forbindelse til en overnaturlig enhed kaldet Aiden.
 
 Ved at spille som både Jodie og Aiden står du over for spektakulære fysiske og psykologiske udfordringer for at forstå, hvad der virkelig ligger bag.
     TEST DINE FÆRDIGHEDER MED 'AVANCEREDE EKSPERIMENTER' Den originale DLC-mission fra PlayStation™-udgivelserne er inkluderet i det fulde pc-spil. Hele spillet kan spilles i to sværhedstilstande og i Solo- eller Duo-tilstand. SPIL HISTORIEN, SOM DU ØNSKER DET Filmisk eller kronologisk rækkefølge? Vælg den måde, hvorpå du vil opleve historien, og spil endda i lokal co-op-tilstand ved hjælp af to forskellige controllere til hver spiller - den ene til at spille som Jodie og den anden til at spille som Aiden. Spil, som du ønsker at spille. FULDT OPTIMERET TIL PC Beyond: Two Souls fås til pc med enestående grafik, herunder 4K-opløsning, bredskærmskompatibilitet på 21:9 og billedhastighed på 60 fps.

Recitazione e narrazione di altissimo livello per un'esperienza videoludica mai provata prima. VIVI UNA VITA STRAORDINARIA: UNA VITA, DUE ANIME    
 Thriller psicologico d'azione con i pluripremiati attori hollywoodiani  Elliot Page  e  Willem Dafoe ,  Beyond: Due Anime™  ti trascina in un giro del mondo mozzafiato nel corso dell'eccezionale vita di Jodie Holmes.
 
 Jodie è diversa. È nata con una connessione a un'entità misteriosa dai poteri incredibili.
 
 Le tue azioni determineranno il destino di Jodie di fronte a sfide straordinarie, pericoli incombenti e perdite dolorose, in un viaggio alla scoperta della sua vera identità.
 
 Con le tue scelte, darai vita a una storia piena d'azione, mentre ti calerai nei panni di una ragazza nata con un legame con un'entità soprannaturale chiamata Aiden.
 
 Controllando sia Jodie che Aiden, affronterai incredibili sfide fisiche e psicologiche per scoprire cosa si cela davvero oltre ciò che percepiscono i nostri sensi.
     METTITI ALLA PROVA CON ‘ESPERIMENTI AVANZATI’ Il gioco completo per PC include anche l'originale missione DLC dei titoli PlayStation™. È giocabile in due difficoltà e in modalità Solo o Duo. CONTROLLA LA STORIA Ordine cinematografico o cronologico? Seleziona in che modo scoprire la storia. Puoi giocare anche in modalità cooperativa locale utilizzando due diversi controller per due giocatori, che interpretano uno Jodie e l'altro Aiden. Decidi tu come giocare, in piena libertà. OTTIMIZZATO PER PC Beyond: Due Anime è giocabile su PC con una straordinaria grafica con risoluzione in 4K, supporto al formato Ultra-Wide (21:9) e un frame rate di 60 FPS.

game.title: Detroit: Become Human
game.description:
Featuring world-renowned actors including Jesse Williams (Grey’s Anatomy), Clancy Brown (Carnivale), Lance Henriksen  (Aliens), Bryan Dechart (True Blood) and Valorie Curry (Twilight). 

WHAT MAKES US HUMAN?    
 
Detroit 2038. Technology has evolved to a point where human like androids are everywhere. They speak, move and behave like human beings, but they are only machines serving humans.

 Play three distinct androids and see a world at the brink of chaos – perhaps our future - through their eyes. Your very decisions will dramatically alter how the game’s intense, branching narrative plays out.
 
 You will face moral dilemmas and decide who lives or dies. With thousands of choices and dozens of possible endings, how will you affect the future of Detroit and humanity’s destiny?
 
     PLAY YOUR PART IN A GRIPPING NARRATIVE 
Enter a world where moral dilemmas and difficult decisions can turn android slaves into world-changing revolutionaries. Discover what it means to be human from the perspective of an outsider – and see the world through the eyes of a machine. 

THEIR LIVES, YOUR CHOICES  
Shape an ambitious branching narrative, where your decisions not only determine the fate of the three main characters, but that of the entire city of Detroit. How you control Kara, Connor and Markus can mean life or death – and if one of them pays the ultimate price, the story still continues… 

COUNTLESS PATHS, COUNTLESS ENDINGS  Every decision you make, no matter how minute, affects the outcome of the story. No playthrough will be exactly the same: replay again and again to discover a totally different conclusion. 

FULLY OPTIMIZED FOR PC  
Detroit: Become Human is brought to PC with stunning graphics, 4K resolution, 60 fps framerate and full integration of both mouse/keyboard and gamepad controls for the most complete Detroit: Become Human experience to date.

Featuring world-renowned actors including Jesse Williams (Grey’s Anatomy), Clancy Brown (Carnivale), Lance Henriksen  (Aliens), Bryan Dechart (True Blood) and Valorie Curry (Twilight). 

WHAT MAKES US HUMAN?

 Play three distinct androids and see a world at the brink of chaos – perhaps our future - through their eyes. Your very decisions will dramatically alter how the game’s intense, branching narrative plays out.
 
 You will face moral dilemmas and decide who lives or dies. With thousands of choices and dozens of possible endings, how will you affect the future of Detroit and humanity’s destiny?
 
     PLAY YOUR PART IN A GRIPPING NARRATIVE

THEIR LIVES, YOUR CHOICES

¡ Detroit: Become Human , el galardonado videojuego de  Quantic Dream , está finalmente disponible en Steam! Con la actuación de actores aclamados mundialmente como  Jesse Williams  (Anatomía de Grey),  Clancy Brown  (Carnivale),  Lance Henriksen  (Aliens),  Bryan Dechart  (True Blood) y  Valorie Curry  (Crepúsculo). ¿QUÉ NOS HACE HUMANOS?    
 Detroit, 2038. La tecnología ha evolucionado hasta tal punto que hay androides de apariencia humana en todas partes. Hablan, se mueven y se comportan como seres humanos, pero no son más que máquinas al servicio de los humanos.
 Maneja a tres androides distintos y contempla un mundo al borde del caos (¿quizás nuestro futuro?) a través de sus ojos. Tus decisiones afectarán drásticamente a la intensa trama ramificada del juego.
 Te enfrentarás a dilemas morales y decidirás quién vive y quién muere. Con miles de decisiones y docenas de posibles finales, ¿cómo afectarás al futuro de Detroit y el destino de la humanidad?
     OCUPA TU LUGAR EN UNA HISTORIA CAUTIVADORA Adéntrate en un mundo donde dilemas morales y difíciles decisiones pueden convertir a los esclavos androides en revolucionarios que cambiarán el mundo. Descubre lo que significa ser humano desde una perspectiva ajena y contempla el mundo con los ojos de una máquina. SUS VIDAS, TUS DECISIONES  Guía las ramificaciones de una historia ambiciosa en la que tus decisiones no solo determinarán el destino de los tres protagonistas, sino de toda la ciudad de Detroit. La forma en que controlas a Kara, Connor y Markus puede suponer su vida o su muerte; y si uno de ellos paga el precio final, la historia continuará... CAMINOS INCONTABLES, INCONTABLES FINALES  Cada decisión que tomes, por ínfima que parezca, afecta al resultado de la historia. Ninguna partida será exactamente igual: repite el juego una y otra vez para descubrir diferentes conclusiones. TOTALMENTE OPTIMIZADO PARA PC  Detroit: Become Human llega a PC con impresionantes gráficos, resolución en 4K, una tasa de fotogramas de 60 FPS e integración completa tanto con ratón y teclado como con mandos, para hacer de esta la experiencia de Detroit: Become Human más completa hasta la fecha.

Detroit: Become Human , la production récompensée de  Quantic Dream , est maintenant disponible sur Steam ! Avec des acteurs de renommée mondiale comme  Jesse Williams  (Grey's Anatomy),  Clancy Brown  (La Caravane de l'Étrange),  Lance Henriksen  (Aliens, le retour),  Bryan Dechart  (True Blood) et  Valorie Curry  (Twilight) QU'EST-CE QUI NOUS REND HUMAIN ?    
 Détroit, 2038. L'évolution de la technologie a créé un monde où les robots androïdes sont partout. Ils parlent, se déplacent et se comportent comme des humains, mais ce ne sont que des machines au service de ces derniers.
 À travers les yeux de trois androïdes, découvrez un monde au bord du chaos. Prenez des décisions, tout en sachant qu'elles auront un immense impact sur l'incroyable histoire du jeu et ses différentes intrigues.
 Vous serez confronté à des dilemmes et devrez décider qui va vivre... et qui doit mourir. Avec des milliers de choix et des dizaines de fins différentes, quelle influence allez-vous avoir sur le futur de Détroit et le destin de l'humanité ?
     JOUEZ UN RÔLE DANS UNE INTRIGUE SURPRENANTE Entrez dans un monde où les dilemmes moraux et les décisions difficiles peuvent transformer des esclaves androïdes en révolutionnaires. Découvrez ce qui vous rend humain, du point de vue de quelqu'un qui ne l'est pas. Voyez le monde à travers les yeux d'un robot. VOS CHOIX, LEURS DESTINS  Découvrez une intrigue fascinante, dans laquelle vos décisions déterminent non seulement le destin des trois personnages principaux, mais également celui de la ville de Détroit tout entière. La vie de Kara, Connor et Markus dépend de la façon dont vous les contrôlez, et si l'un d'entre eux périt... l'histoire continue. DES CHOIX ET DES FINS À L'INFINI  Chaque décision, même la plus infime, affecte le déroulement de l'histoire. Chaque partie est différente : vous pouvez rejouer encore et encore pour découvrir d'autres possibilités. OPTIMISÉ POUR PC  Detroit: Become Human arrive maintenant sur PC avec des graphismes incroyables, une résolution 4K, un débit 60 FPS et une intégration complète des commandes souris/clavier ou gamepad, pour vous offrir l'expérience de jeu la plus complète à ce jour.

Detroit: Become Human[/b] - die preisgekrönte Videospielproduktion von  Quantic Dream  ist endlich auf Steam erhältlich! Mit weltberühmten Schauspielern wie  Jesse Williams  (Grey's Anatomy),  Clancy Brown  (Carnivale),  Lance Henriksen  (Aliens),  Bryan Dechart  (True Blood) und  Valorie Curry  (Twilight). WAS MACHT UNS ZU MENSCHEN?    
 Detroit 2038. Die Technologie hat sich so weit entwickelt, dass menschenähnliche Androiden überall zu finden sind. Sie sprechen, bewegen und verhalten sich wie Menschen, aber sie sind nur Maschinen, die dem Menschen dienen.
 Spielen Sie als drei verschiedene Androiden und sehen Sie durch ihre Augen eine Welt am Rande des Chaos, die vielleicht unsere Zukunft sein könnte. Ihre gezielten Entscheidungen werden den Ablauf der intensiven, verzweigten Story des Spiels drastisch verändern.
 Sie stehen vor einem moralischen Dilemma und entscheiden, wer lebt oder stirbt. Wie werden Sie bei Tausenden von Wahlmöglichkeiten und Dutzenden möglicher Enden die Zukunft Detroits und das Schicksal der Menschheit beeinflussen?
     SPIELEN SIE IHREN TEIL IN EINER PACKENDEN STORY Betreten Sie in eine Welt, in der moralische Dilemmata und schwierige Entscheidungen androide Sklaven in weltbewegende Revolutionäre verwandeln können. Entdecken Sie aus der Perspektive eines Außenstehenden, was es bedeutet, ein Mensch zu sein – und sehen Sie die Welt mit den Augen einer Maschine. IHR LEBEN, IHRE WAHL  Gestalten Sie eine ambitionierte und verwobene Story, in der Ihre Entscheidungen nicht nur das Schicksal der drei Hauptfiguren, sondern das der gesamten Stadt Detroit bestimmen. Wie Sie Kara, Connor und Markus kontrollieren, kann Leben oder Tod bedeuten – und wenn einer der Charaktere stirbt, geht die Geschichte trotzdem weiter ... UNZÄHLIGE WEGE, ZAHLLOSE ENDEN  Jede Entscheidung, die Sie treffen, wie klein sie auch sein mag, beeinflusst das Ende der Geschichte. Kein Durchspielen gleicht dem anderen: Spielen Sie immer und immer wieder, um ein völlig anderes Ende zu erleben. VOLLSTÄNDIG OPTIMIERT FÜR PC  Detroit: Become Human erscheint auf dem PC mit atemberaubender Grafik, 4K-Auflösung, 60 fps Framerate und voller Integration für Maus/Tastatur und Gamepad für das bis dato vollständigste Erlebnis von Detroit: Become Human.

Detroit: Become Human , o jogo premiado produzido pela  Quantic Dream , está finalmente disponível no Steam! Com atores mundialmente famosos, incluindo  Jesse Williams  (Anatomia de Grey),  Clancy Brown  (Carnivale),  Lance Henriksen  (Aliens),  Bryan Dechart  (True Blood) e  Valorie Curry  (Crepúsculo). O QUE É QUE NOS TORNA HUMANOS?    
 Detroit 2038. A tecnologia evoluiu até um ponto onde há androides idênticos a humanos por toda a parte. Eles falam, movem-se e comportam-se como seres humanos, mas são apenas máquinas ao serviço deles.
 Joga como três androides diferentes e vê um mundo à beira do caos - quiçá alusivo ao nosso futuro - através da sua perspetiva. As tuas decisões vão alterar significativamente o desenrolar da intensa narrativa ramificada do jogo.
 Vais enfrentar dilemas morais e decidir quem vive ou morre. Com milhares de escolhas e dezenas de finais possíveis, como é que irás afetar o futuro de Detroit e o destino da humanidade?
     DESEMPENHA O TEU PAPEL NUMA NARRATIVA EMOCIONANTE Entra num mundo onde dilemas morais e decisões difíceis podem transformar escravos androides em revolucionários que podem mudar o mundo. Descobre o que significa ser humano da perspetiva de um estranho - e vê o mundo através dos olhos de uma máquina. AS SUAS VIDAS, AS TUAS ESCOLHAS  Dá forma a uma narrativa ramificada ambiciosa, onde as tuas decisões não só determinam o destino dos três personagens principais, mas também o de toda a cidade de Detroit. Como controlas a Kara, o Connor e o Markus pode levar à vida ou à morte - e se um deles pagar o derradeiro preço, a história continua... INÚMEROS CAMINHOS, INÚMEROS FINAIS  Todas as decisões que tomas, não importa o quão minúsculas, afetam o desenrolar da narrativa. Nenhum jogo será exatamente igual: joga várias vezes para descobrir uma conclusão totalmente diferente. COMPLETAMENTE OTIMIZADO PARA PC  Detroit: Become Human chega aos PCs com gráficos deslumbrantes, resolução 4K de 60 fotogramas por segundo e integração completa de controlos de rato/teclado ou comando para a experiência mais completa de sempre de Detroit: Become Human.

Detroit: Become Human , den prisvindende videospilsproduktion fra  Quantic Dream , er endelig tilgængelig på Steam! Verdensberømte skuespillere medvirker, herunder  Jesse Williams  (Grey’s Anatomy),  Clancy Brown  (Carnivale),  Lance Henriksen  (Aliens),  Bryan Dechart  (True Blood) og  Valorie Curry  (Twilight). HVAD GØR OS TIL MENNESKER?    
 Detroit 2038. Teknologien har udviklet sig til et punkt, hvor menneskelignende androider er overalt. De taler, bevæger og opfører sig som mennesker, men de er kun maskiner, der tjener mennesker.
 Spil som tre forskellige androider, og oplev en verden på randen af kaos - måske vores fremtid - gennem deres øjne. Dine beslutninger vil på dramatisk vis ændre, hvordan spillets intense, komplekse fortælling udfolder sig.
 Du kommer til at stå over for moralske dilemmaer og skal beslutte, hvem der lever eller dør. Hvordan vil du påvirke Detroits fremtid og menneskehedens skæbne, når du bliver stillet overfor tusindvis af valg og snesevis af mulige slutninger?
     SPIL DIN ROLLE I EN MEDRIVENDE FORTÆLLING Træd ind i en verden, hvor moralske dilemmaer og vanskelige beslutninger kan gøre androide-slaver til revolutionære, der ændrer verden. Oplev, hvad det betyder at være menneske fra en udenforståendes perspektiv - og se verden gennem en maskines øjne. DERES LIV, DINE VALG  Skab en ambitiøs, kompleks fortælling, hvor dine beslutninger ikke kun bestemmer de tre hovedpersoners skæbne, men også hele Detroits skæbne. Hvordan du styrer Kara, Connor og Markus kan betyde liv eller død - og hvis en af dem betaler den ultimative pris, fortsætter historien stadig… UTALLIGE MULIGHEDER, UTALLIGE SLUTNINGER  Hver beslutning, du træffer, uanset hvor ubetydelig den er, påvirker resultatet af historien. Intet spil er nøjagtigt det samme: spil igen og igen for at opdage en helt anden konklusion. FULDT OPTIMERET TIL PC  Detroit: Become Human fås til pc med enestående grafik, 4K-opløsning, billedhastighed på 60 fps og fuld integration af både mus/tastatur- og gamepad-kontroller for den mest komplette Detroit: Become Human-oplevelse til dato.

Detroit: Become Human , il pluripremiato videogioco prodotto da  Quantic Dream , è finalmente disponibile su Steam! E ha un cast di eccezione che include  Jesse Williams  (Grey’s Anatomy),  Clancy Brown  (Carnivàle),  Lance Henriksen  (Alien),  Bryan Dechart  (True Blood) e  Valorie Curry  (Twilight). COS'È CHE CI RENDE UMANI?    
 Detroit, 2038. La tecnologia si è evoluta a tal punto che gli androidi umanoidi sono ovunque. Parlano, si muovono e si comportano come persone, ma sono solo macchine al servizio degli esseri umani.
 Controlla tre diversi androidi e osserva coi loro occhi un mondo a un passo dal caos... forse, il nostro stesso futuro. Saranno le tue decisioni ad alterare il corso degli eventi e a governare la storia attraverso le complesse ramificazioni della trama.
 Affronterai dilemmi morali e stabilirai chi vive e chi muore. Con migliaia di scelte e decine di finali possibili, come influirai sul futuro di Detroit e il destino dell'umanità?
     PRENDI PARTE A UNA STORIA COINVOLGENTE Entra in un universo in cui dilemmi morali e decisioni difficili possono trasformare degli schiavi androidi in rivoluzionari destinati a cambiare il mondo. Scopri cosa significa essere umani da una prospettiva esterna e guarda il mondo attraverso gli occhi di una macchina. LE LORO VITE, LE TUE SCELTE  Fatti strada attraverso un'ambiziosa struttura narrativa ramificata, in cui le tue decisioni non determinano solo il fato dei tre protagonisti, ma di tutta la città di Detroit. Il modo in cui controllerai Kara, Connor e Markus farà la differenza tra la vita e la morte. E se uno di loro la pagherà a caro prezzo, la storia andrà comunque avanti... INFINITE POSSIBILITÀ, INFINITI FINALI  Ogni scelta che fai, per quanto piccola, influenza l'esito della storia. Nessuna partita sarà esattamente uguale a un'altra: gioca più e più volte per arrivare a conclusioni totalmente differenti. OTTIMIZZATO PER PC  Detroit: Become Human ha una straordinaria grafica con risoluzione in 4K, frame rate di 60 FPS e integrazione completa di mouse/tastiera e gamepad per immergersi totalmente nell'esperienza di Detroit: Become Human.

game.brief:
Featuring world-renowned actors including Jesse Williams (Grey’s Anatomy), Clancy Brown (Carnivale), Lance Henriksen  (Aliens), Bryan Dechart (True Blood) and Valorie Curry (Twilight). 

WHAT MAKES US HUMAN?    
 
Detroit 2038. Technology has evolved to a point where human like androids are everywhere. They speak, move and behave like human beings, but they are only machines serving humans.

 Play three distinct androids and see a world at the brink of chaos – perhaps our future - through their eyes. Your very decisions will dramatically alter how the game’s intense, branching narrative plays out.
 
 You will face moral dilemmas and decide who lives or dies. With thousands of choices and dozens of possible endings, how will you affect the future of Detroit and humanity’s destiny?
 
     PLAY YOUR PART IN A GRIPPING NARRATIVE 
Enter a world where moral dilemmas and difficult decisions can turn android slaves into world-changing revolutionaries. Discover what it means to be human from the perspective of an outsider – and see the world through the eyes of a machine. 

THEIR LIVES, YOUR CHOICES  
Shape an ambitious branching narrative, where your decisions not only determine the fate of the three main characters, but that of the entire city of Detroit. How you control Kara, Connor and Markus can mean life or death – and if one of them pays the ultimate price, the story still continues… 

COUNTLESS PATHS, COUNTLESS ENDINGS  Every decision you make, no matter how minute, affects the outcome of the story. No playthrough will be exactly the same: replay again and again to discover a totally different conclusion. 

FULLY OPTIMIZED FOR PC  
Detroit: Become Human is brought to PC with stunning graphics, 4K resolution, 60 fps framerate and full integration of both mouse/keyboard and gamepad controls for the most complete Detroit: Become Human experience to date.

game.title: Stray
game.description:
Lost, alone and separated from family, a stray cat must untangle an ancient mystery to escape a long-forgotten city.  
 
Stray is a third-person cat adventure game set amidst the detailed, neon-lit alleys of a decaying cybercity and the murky environments of its seedy underbelly. Roam surroundings high and low, defend against unforeseen threats and solve the mysteries of this unwelcoming place inhabited by curious droids and dangerous creatures. 
  
See the world through the eyes of a cat and interact with the environment in playful ways. Be stealthy, nimble, silly, and sometimes as annoying as possible with the strange inhabitants of this mysterious world. 
 
Along the way, the cat befriends a small flying drone, known only as B-12. With the help of this newfound companion, the duo must find a way out. 
 
Stray is developed by BlueTwelve Studio, a small team from the south of France mostly made up of cats and a handful of humans.
