game.title: Resident Evil 6
game.description:
Blending action and survival horror, Resident Evil 6 promises to be the dramatic horror experience of 2013. Resident Evil favorites Leon S. Kennedy, Chris Redfield and Ada Wong are joined by new characters, including Jake Muller, to face a new horror, the highly virulent C-virus, as the narrative moves between North America, the war-torn Eastern European state of Edonia and the Chinese city of Lanshiang. 
 
 With four distinct, yet interwoven story threads, each with their own pair of protagonists for either solo or co-op play, both offline and online, not only will Resident Evil 6 deliver both different perspectives and gameplay styles but, with the introduction of the innovative Crossover mechanic players will be able to team up and share the horror. At key moments during the game, up to four players can join together online to tackle a specific situation, with some stages seeing the usual partnerships swapped to further increase the depth of gameplay. Key Features     Horror on a global scale  – No longer confined to a specific location, the outbreak of the C-virus is worldwide with the action taking place in North America, Eastern Europe and China The most expansive Resident Evil game to date- Experience the horror through four distinct yet intertwined campaigns: 
    Crossover Gameplay  - Not only does each story cross paths, but so does the action – At significant points when the narrative draws pairs of characters together, the all new Crossover mechanic allows up to four players to experience the horror together online 
    Solo or co-op play  – Resident Evil 6 delivers both single and two player co-op gameplay either offline or online (however Ada Wong’s campaign is one player only) 
    New threats on the rise  – Confront the results of the C-virus in all its varied and deadly forms including zombies, J’avo, Chrysalids, and much more Agent Hunt Mode - In this all new online mode for the Resident Evil series, experience the action from the other side. As a ‘hunter’, join the enemy side to become one of the game’s zombies, J’avo or other C-virus mutations and infiltrate another active game session to eliminate the human characters. 
    Play your way  – Use skill points to upgrade your character to provide faster reload speed, improved firepower or increase your health bar with the Character Skill system 
    Redesigned control system  – Resident Evil 6 features an evolved control system allowing players to shoot while moving; slide; roll in any direction and to take cover along with the addition of an enhanced melee attack 
    Mercenaries returns  – Players will once more be able to enjoy the highly popular Mercenaries Mode
    The Mercenaries No Mercy  - An experience available only on your PC, this additional mode is packed with twice as many enemies as The Mercenaries!
    7 Additional Stages for the Extra Content Modes  - Previously available for purchase as DLC for the console versions, these 7 additional stages come as *standard on the PC version.  (*These stages are unlocked via achievements.)
    Left 4 Dead 2 Crossover Patch  - Scheduled to be released for free via the April 5 2013 Title Update. Blast your way through The Mercenaries No Mercy as your favorite Left 4 Dead 2 characterswith the Infected appearing as enemies as well!
    Compatible with Console Version Feature   - The PC version is compatible with all of the latest features that have been added to the console versions, and is compatible with  too.

localized_description.text:
混合了动作和生存恐怖两大要素，Resident Evil 6保证为玩家带来充满戏剧性惊栗体验的2013。于 Resident Evil 系列为人喜爱的 Leon S. Kennedy、Chris Redfield 与 Ada Wong，将会加入新角色阵容如 Jake Muller，一同面对高毒性 C-virus 的新威胁，而故事更会在北美、被战火蹂躏的东欧国家 Edonia 及中国某城市 Lanshiang。
 
 每一故事有独立的主角，可供单人或协力游玩（不连线或连线），4 个故事却也互相交织。这不仅是 Resident Evil 6 所提供的特色，更有崭新的 Crossover 机制，玩家可以组队及互相分担。游戏里的关键时刻，最多可以 4 人透过联机参与，以应付特殊情况。部分关卡更会体验到切换可使用角色，增加游戏进程的深度。 游戏特色    惊栗遍全球  —— 不再局限于特定一个地方，今次 C-virus 在全球多个地方爆发并采取相应行动，包括北美、东欧及中国，遂成为迄今最大规模的 Resident Evil 游戏 — 透过 4 个主要目的地却又互相交织的惊栗体验︰
    Crossover 游玩方式  —— 无论是故事或路径同样是相连︰在重要分岐点，两名角色会组成队伍，这个新系统允许多达 4 名玩家同场，以联机方式一同体验。
    单人或协力  —— Resident Evil 6 同时带来单人及 2 人协力模式（不联机或联机。Ada Wong 故事只限单人模式）
    新威胁冒起   —— 与多种由 C-virus 带来的不知名生物正面交锋，包括丧尸、J'avo、Chrysalids。而在 Agent Hunt 模式就更多︰这个 Resident Evil 系列全新联机模式里面，可以从另一面体验。玩家身为「Hunter」并加入敌方，以丧尸、J'avo 或其他 C-virus 引致的异变生物，渗入其他正在联机的游戏，消灭人类角色。
    玩出自我风格  —— 透过技能点数和角色技能系统升级角色，提供更快装弹速度、改良火力或提升体力计上限。
    重新设计的操作系统   —— Residnet Evil 6 的混合操作系统，让玩家可以在移动时开枪、滑行、滚动往任何方向，以及寻找掩护时使出强化近战刀攻击。
    Mercenaries 再临  —— 玩家可以再度享受广受欢迎的 Mercenaries 模式
    The Mercenaries No Mercy   —— 这个附加模式比普通版的敌人数量多 1 倍，唯 PC 版本独有！
    额外内容模式，7 个附加版图  —— 早前在家用机版本以 DLC 形式发售，现在一并收录、成为 PC 版本标准内容*。（*透过游戏里取得成就并解锁）
    Left 4 Dead 2 Crossover   —— 定于 2013 年 4 月 5 日免费提供的更新，让玩家以 Left 4 Dead 2 角色参战 The Mercenaries No Mercy，亦有部分敌人感染 C-virus 后登场。
    兼容家用机版本特色 /    —— PC 版本与家用机版本已有功能兼容，亦同时支持

混合了動作和生存恐怖兩大要素，Resident Evil 6保證為玩家帶來充滿戲劇性驚慄體驗的2013。於 Resident Evil 系列為人喜愛的 Leon S. Kennedy、Chris Redfield 與 Ada Wong，將會加入新角色陣容如 Jake Muller，一同面對高毒性 C-virus 的新威脅，而故事更會在北美、被戰火蹂躪的東歐國家 Edonia 及中國某城市 Lanshiang。
 
 每一故事有獨立的主角，可供單人或協力遊玩（不連線或連線），4 個故事卻也互相交織。這不僅是 Resident Evil 6 所提供的特色，更有嶄新的 Crossover 機制，玩家可以組隊及互相分擔。遊戲裡的關鍵時刻，最多可以 4 人透過連線參與，以應付特殊情況。部分關卡更會體驗到切換可使用角色，增加遊戲進程的深度。 遊戲特色    驚慄遍全球  —— 不再局限於特定一個地方，今次 C-virus 在全球多個地方爆發並採取相應行動，包括北美、東歐及中國，遂成為迄今最大規模的 Resident Evil 遊戲 — 透過 4 個主要目的地卻又互相交織的驚慄體驗︰
    Crossover 遊玩方式  —— 無論是故事或路徑同樣是相連︰在重要分岐點，兩名角色會組成隊伍，這個新系統允許多達 4 名玩家同場，以連線方式一同體驗。
    單人或協力  —— Resident Evil 6 同時帶來單人及 2 人協力模式（不連線或連線。Ada Wong 故事只限單人模式）
    新威脅冒起   —— 與多種由 C-virus 帶來的不知名生物正面交鋒，包括喪屍、J'avo、Chrysalids。而在 Agent Hunt 模式就更多︰這個 Resident Evil 系列全新連線模式裡面，可以從另一面體驗。玩家身為「Hunter」並加入敵方，以喪屍、J'avo 或其他 C-virus 引致的異變生物，滲入其他正在連線的遊戲，消滅人類角色。
    玩出自我風格  —— 透過技能點數和角色技能系統升級角色，提供更快裝彈速度、改良火力或提升體力計上限。
    重新設計的操作系統   —— Residnet Evil 6 的混合操作系統，讓玩家可以在移動時開槍、滑行、滾動往任何方向，以及尋找掩護時使出強化近戰刀攻擊。
    Mercenaries 再臨  —— 玩家可以再度享受廣受歡迎的 Mercenaries 模式
    The Mercenaries No Mercy   —— 這個附加模式比普通版的敵人數量多 1 倍，唯 PC 版本獨有！
    額外內容模式，7 個附加版圖  —— 早前在家用機版本以 DLC 形式發售，現在一併收錄、成為 PC 版本標準內容*。（*透過遊戲裡取得成就並解鎖）
    Left 4 Dead 2 Crossover   —— 定於 2013 年 4 月 5 日免費提供的更新，讓玩家以 Left 4 Dead 2 角色參戰 The Mercenaries No Mercy，亦有部分敵人感染 C-virus 後登場。
    兼容家用機版本特色 /    —— PC 版本與家用機版本已有功能兼容，亦同時支援

    Crossover Gameplay  - Not only does each story cross paths, but so does the action – At significant points when the narrative draws pairs of characters together, the all new Crossover mechanic allows up to four players to experience the horror together online

Con una mezcla de acción, terror y supervivencia, Resident Evil 6 promete ser la experiencia de terror dramático de 2013. Los personajes favoritos de la saga Resident Evil como Leon S. Kennedy, Chris Redfield y Ada Wong unen sus fuerzas a nuevos personajes, incluyendo a Jake Muller, para enfrentarse a un nuevo horror, el altamente virulento virus-C, a medida que la narrativa se desplaza desde Norteamérica hasta el estado de Edonia, devastado por la guerra y situado en Europa del Este, y hasta la ciudad china de Lanshiang. 
 
 Comenzando con cuatro historias diferentes pero entrelazadas, cada una con una pareja de protagonistas para jugar solo o en cooperativo, tanto local como online, Resident Evil 6 no sólo proporciona diferentes perspectivas y estilos de juego, sino que introduce la innovadora mecánica Crossover que permite a los jugadores unirse y compartir el horror. En los momentos clave del juego, hasta 4 jugadores pueden unirse online para enfrentarse a una situación específica, con cambios de pareja en algunas zonas para aumentar la profundidad del juego. Características Principales    Horror a escala global:  Ya no estamos confinados en un lugar concreto, la epidemia del virus-C se extiende por todo el mundo y la acción transcurre en Norteamérica, Europa del Este y China. Es el Resident Evil que más viaja hasta el momento, vive el horror desde cuatro campañas distintas pero interconectadas 
 
    Mecánica de juego Crossover:  Las historias no sólo cruzan sus caminos, también lo hace la acción. En los puntos importantes donde la narrativa une a varias parejas de jugadores, la nueva mecánica Crossover permite que hasta cuatro jugadores experimenten el terror online 
 
    Juega solo o en cooperativo:  Resident Evil 6 permite jugar solo o en cooperativo local u online (aunque la campaña de Ada Wong es para un jugador) 
 
    Surgen nuevas amenazas:  Enfréntate a los resultados del virus-C en toda sus variadas y mortíferas formas, incluyendo zombis, J’avo, Crisálidas y mucho más. Modo Agent Hunt: En este modo online, nuevo para la saga Resident Evil, experimenta la acción desde el otro lado. Como un ‘cazador’, únete al lado enemigo y conviértete en uno de los zombis del juego, J’avo o cualquier otra mutación del virus-C, e infíltrate en otra sesión de juego activa para eliminar a los jugadores humanos 
 
    Juega a tu manera:  Utiliza puntos de habilidad para mejorar tu personaje y conseguir una velocidad de recarga más rápida, una mayor potencia de fuego o aumentar tu barra de salud con el sistema Character Skill 
 
    Sistema de control rediseñado:  Resident Evil 6 incluye un sistema de control evolucionado que permite a los jugadores disparar mientras se mueven, se deslizan o ruedan en cualquier dirección, además de utilizar coberturas y un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo mejorado
 
    Vuelven los mercenarios:  Los jugadores podrán disfrutar de nuevo del popular Mercenaries Mode 
 
    Los Mercenarios:  sin piedad: ¡Una experiencia disponible en exclusiva para tu PC! ¡Un modo adicional que contiene el doble de enemigos que el modo original!
 
    7 escenarios adicionales para el modo "Otros":  En la versión para consolas, estos 7 escenarios adicionales estaban disponibles como DLC, sin embargo en la versión de PC vendrán incluidos en el juego original.
 * Para desbloquear los nuevos escenarios tendrás que completar los logros correspondientes.
 
    Actualización "Crossover" de Left 4 Dead 2:  Podrás conseguirla junto con la actualización para el juego planeada para el 5 de abril de 2013 de manera gratuita. ¡Disfruta de una nueva incursión a través del modo "Los Mercenarios: sin piedad", jugando con tus personajes favoritos de Left 4 Dead 2 para acabar con la amenaza de los infectados!
 
    Compatible con las actualizaciones de consola y .:  La versión de PC es compatible con todas las actualizaciones que se han realizado hasta ahora para las versiones de consola y con .

Mélange d'action et de survival horror, Resident Evil 6 promet d'être l'expérience dramatique de 2013. Les figures les plus populaires de la série Resident Evil, Leon S. Kennedy, Chris Redfield et Ada Wong sont rejoints par de nouveaux personnages, dont Jake Muller, pour affronter une nouvelle menace : le très virulent Virus-C. Le scénario les entrainera de l'Amérique du Nord, à la ville chinoise de Lanshiang, en passant par Edonia, un état d'Europe de l'Est déchiré par la guerre.
 
 Commençant avec quatre histoires distinctes mais étroitement liées. Chacune d'entre-elles avec son duo de protagonistes, pour jouer en solo ou en coop, en ligne ou non, permettant à Resident Evil 6 de proposer plusieurs perspectives et différents styles de gameplay, ainsi que la possibilité aux joueurs de faire équipe et vivre l'horreur ensemble, grâce à l'introduction de la fonctionnalité Crossover novatrice. À des moments clés du jeu, jusqu'à quatre joueurs pourront unir leurs forces en ligne pour faire face à une situation spécifique, parfois même les duos habituels permuteront afin d'augmenter encore la profondeur du gameplay. Caractéristiques principales :     L'horreur à une échelle planétaire  – L'épidémie du Virus-C n'est plus limitée à une zone spécifique mais est belle et bien mondiale, l'action prenant place en Amérique du Nord, en Europe de l'Est et en Chine. Resident Evil le plus vaste jamais créé, vivez l'horreur à travers quatre campagnes distinctes mais étroitement liées :
 
    Un gameplay en Crossover  – Non seulement chaque histoires s'entrecroise, mais l'action aussi – À des moments clés, l'histoire réunira des duos de personnages, le tout nouveau système de Crossover permettant jusqu'à 4 joueurs de faire équipe pour vivre l'horreur ensemble 
 
    Jouez en solo ou en coop  – Resident Evil 6 offre un gameplay en solo ou en coop à deux joueurs, en ligne ou en local (la campagne d'Ada Wong se joue cependant uniquement en solo) 
 
    De nouvelles menaces  – Affrontez les conséquences du Virus-C sous toutes ses formes, dont les zombies, les J’avo, les Chrysalides et bien plus encore. Mode Agent Hunt – Dans ce tout nouveau mode en ligne pour la série Resident Evil, découvrez l'action depuis le côté adverse. Dans la peau d'un « chasseur », rejoignez les rangs ennemis et devenez l’un des zombies, J’avo ou un autre mutant résultant des effets du Virus-C, avant d'infiltrer une partie en cours afin d'éliminer les personnages humains. 
 
    Jouez à votre manière  – Utilisez des Points d’habileté pour améliorer votre personnage et lui donner accès à une vitesse de rechargement plus rapide, une puissance de feu supérieure, ou encore une plus grande barre de vie grâce au système d’Habileté des personnages
 
    Un système de contrôle repensé  – Resident Evil 6 présente un système de contrôle évolué permettant aux joueurs de tirer tout en se déplaçant, en faisant des glissades ou des roulades dans n'importe quelle direction, de se mettre à couvert et de bénéficier d'attaques au corps à corps améliorées 
 
    Le retour des Mercenaires  – Les joueurs pourront une nouvelle fois profiter du très populaire mode Mercenaires.
  
    Les Mercenaires Pas de quartier  –Une expérience exclusivement disponible sur PC, ce mode additionnel contient deux fois plus d'ennemis que Les Mercenaires !
 
    7 cartes additionnelles dans EXTRA  – Disponibles à l'achat sous forme de contenus téléchargeables pour les versions consoles, ces 7 cartes sont disponibles en série sur la version PC. 
 * Elles seront débloquées avec les succès.
 
    Patch Left 4 Dead 2 Crossover  – Prévu pour être disponible gratuitement avec la mise à jour du 5 avril 2013. Jouez au mode Mercenaires Pas de quartier avec vos personnages de Left 4 Dead 2. Les infectés apparaîtront aussi en tant qu'ennemis !
 
    Compatible avec les mises à jour consoles et   – La version PC est compatible avec toutes les dernières fonctions des versions consoles, ainsi que .

Als eine Mischung aus Action und Survival Horror verspricht Resident Evil 6 die dramatische Horrorspielerfahrung des Jahres 2012 zu werden. Den beliebten Serienhelden Leon S. Kennedy und Chris Redfield stehen neue Charaktere wie etwa Jake Muller zur Seite, um sich einer globalen Bedrohung – dem hochansteckenden C-Virus zu stellen, während die Handlung zwischen den Schauplätzen Nord-Amerika, den kriegszerütteten Staat Edonia in Osteuropa und der chinesischen Stadt Lanshiang wechselt.
 
 
 Resident Evil 6 beinhaltet vier grundverschiedene und dennoch miteinander verwobene Story-Stränge – jeder mit seinem eigenen Protagonisten-Paar, das entweder solo oder gemeinsam im Koop sowohl offline als auch online spielbar ist und bietet nicht nur unterschiedliche Blickwinkel und Spielarten, sondern mit der Einführung der innovativen Crossover Spielmechanik können Spieler sich nun zusammentun und den Horror gemeinsam erleben. An wichtigen Handlungspunkten, bei denen sich die Geschichten der Akteure überkreuzen, können bis zu vier Spieler vereint spezifische Situationen meistern und in einigen Abschnitten werden die Partner gewechselt, um das Spielgeschehen noch weiter zu vertiefen.
 . Haupteigenschaften     Horror von globalem Ausmaß  – nicht mehr ausschließlich auf eine bestimmte Gegend beschränkt, entfacht der Ausbruch des C-Virus nun weltweit Angst und Schrecken.
 
    Das bislang weitläufigste Resident Evil Spiel  – erleben Sie den Horror durch vier unterschiedliche, miteinander verwobene Kampagnen. 
 
    Crossover Gameplay  – ebenso wie Handlungsstränge verwoben sind, ist auch die Action überlagert – an wichtigen Handlungspunkten, bei denen sich die Geschichten der Akteure überkreuzen, werden die Handlungen zweier Charaktere vereint und die ganz neue Crossover-Spielmechanik erlaubt es bis zu vier Spielern gemeinsam den Horror online zu erleben.
 
    Solo oder Koop  – Resident Evil 6 bietet Einzelspieler- und Koop-Gameplay, sowohl offline als auch online (Ada Wongs Kampagne ist jedoch nur im Einzelspierlmodus spielbar). 
 
    Neue Bedrohungen am Horizont  – Konfrontieren Sie das Ausmaß des C-Virus in all seinen Ausprägungen und tödlichen Formen inklusive Zombies, J’avo, Chrysalids und vielen mehr. Agent Hunt Mode – In diesem neuen Online-Modus für die Resident Evil Serie erleben Sie die Action aus anderer Perspektive. Als ein ‘Hunter’ werden Sie zu einem der Zombies, J’avo oder andere C-Virus Mutationen und infiltrieren andere aktive Spiele, um die dortigen menschlichen Charaktere zu beseitigen.
 
    Spielen Sie so wie Sie wollen  – Nutzen Sie Skill-Punkte, um Ihren Charakter zu verbessern und kürzere Aufladezeiten, verbesserter Feuerkraft oder mehr Lebenspunkten im Charakter-Skill-System auszuwählen.
 
    Neu gestaltetes Steuerungssystem  – Resident Evil 6 beinhaltet ein weiter entwickeltes Kontrollsystem, das es Spielern ermöglicht zu schießen, während sie sich bewegen, rutschen, in alle Richtungen rollen sowie in Deckung gehen. Ebenso wurden die Möglichkeiten des Nahkampfes weiter ausgebaut. 
 
    Die Söldner:  Keine Gnade – Dieser PC-exklusive Modus fordert Sie mit doppelt so vielen Gegnern wie der Standardmodus "Die Söldner"!
 
    7 zusätzliche Abschnitte für die Modi der Zusatzinhalte  – Diese 7 zusätzlichen Abschnitte, in den Konsolenversionen kostenpflichtige Inhalte zum Herunterladen, sind in der PC-Fassung standardmäßig dabei.
 * Diese Abschnitte können über die Erfolge freigeschaltet werden.
 
    Left 4 Dead 2 Crossover-Patch  – Voraussichtlicher Veröffentlichungstermin für dieses kostenlose Titel-Update: 5 April 2013. Schießen Sie sich mit Ihren Lieblingscharakteren aus Left 4 Dead 2 durch Die Söldner: Keine Gnade und treffen Sie auf die Infizierten als Gegner!
 
    Kompatibilität mit den Features der Konsolenversionen /   – Die PC-Version ist kompatibel mit all den Features, die den Konsolenversionen hinzugefügt wurden, inklusive

Blending action and survival horror, Resident Evil 6 promises to be the dramatic horror experience of 2013. Resident Evil favorites Leon S. Kennedy, Chris Redfield and Ada Wong are joined by new characters, including Jake Muller, to face a new horror, the highly virulent C-virus, as the narrative moves between North America, the war-torn Eastern European state of Edonia and the Chinese city of Lanshiang. 
 
 With four distinct, yet interwoven story threads, each with their own pair of protagonists for either solo or co-op play, both offline and online, not only will Resident Evil 6 deliver both different perspectives and gameplay styles but, with the introduction of the innovative Crossover mechanic players will be able to team up and share the horror. At key moments during the game, up to four players can join together online to tackle a specific situation, with some stages seeing the usual partnerships swapped to further increase the depth of gameplay. Key Features     Horror on a global scale  – No longer confined to a specific location, the outbreak of the C-virus is worldwide with the action taking place in North America, Eastern Europe and China The most expansive Resident Evil game to date- Experience the horror through four distinct yet intertwined campaigns: 
    Crossover Gameplay  - Not only does each story cross paths, but so does the action – At significant points when the narrative draws pairs of characters together, the all new Crossover mechanic allows up to four players to experience the horror together online 
    Solo or co-op play  – Resident Evil 6 delivers both single and two player co-op gameplay either offline or online (however Ada Wong’s campaign is one player only) 
    New threats on the rise  – Confront the results of the C-virus in all its varied and deadly forms including zombies, J’avo, Chrysalids, and much more Agent Hunt Mode - In this all new online mode for the Resident Evil series, experience the action from the other side. As a ‘hunter’, join the enemy side to become one of the game’s zombies, J’avo or other C-virus mutations and infiltrate another active game session to eliminate the human characters. 
    Play your way  – Use skill points to upgrade your character to provide faster reload speed, improved firepower or increase your health bar with the Character Skill system 
    Redesigned control system  – Resident Evil 6 features an evolved control system allowing players to shoot while moving; slide; roll in any direction and to take cover along with the addition of an enhanced melee attack 
    Mercenaries returns  – Players will once more be able to enjoy the highly popular Mercenaries Mode
    The Mercenaries No Mercy  - An experience available only on your PC, this additional mode is packed with twice as many enemies as The Mercenaries!
    7 Additional Stages for the Extra Content Modes  - Previously available for purchase as DLC for the console versions, these 7 additional stages come as *standard on the PC version.  (*These stages are unlocked via achievements.)
    Left 4 Dead 2 Crossover Patch  - Scheduled to be released for free via the April 5 2013 Title Update. Blast your way through The Mercenaries No Mercy as your favorite Left 4 Dead 2 characterswith the Infected appearing as enemies as well!
    Compatible with Console Version Feature   - The PC version is compatible with all of the latest features that have been added to the console versions, and is compatible with  too.

ラクーンシティでの事件から十数年後となる2013年を舞台に、世界規模で発生するバイオテロとの闘いが、いま幕を開ける。レオン・S・ケネディ、クリス・レッドフィールド、シリーズを代表する主人公の初共演をはじめ、新旧キャラクターも多数登場。 
 
 中国”蘭祥”、アメリカ”トールオークス”、東欧”イドニア共和国”世界各地を舞台に7人の主人公の運命が交差していく。
 
 かつてない壮大なスケール、緻密に練りこまれたストーリー、【恐怖】【興奮】【感動】全てが詰め込まれた臨場感あるゲーム体験。より恐しく、よりリアルに、そして、よりドラマチックに。シリーズナンバリング最新作が、最高のホラーエンターテイメントとして遂に登場。 主な特徴    ザ・マーセナリーズ　アンリミッテド  - 　ザ・マーセナリーズに比べ敵の数が2倍以上出るＰＣ版だけの追加エキストラコンテンツ。
 
    エキストラコンテンツ用７ステージ追加 
 　家庭用版では、有料ＤＬＣだったエキストラコンテンツ用の７ステージがＰＣ版では最初から入っている。
 ※ステージは実績によるアンロック型になっています。
 
    LEFT 4 DEAD 2 Crossover パッチ  - 　2013年4月5日タイトルアップデートとして無料配信予定。　LEFT 4 DEAD 2 の主人公がザ・マーセナリーズ　アンリミッテドでプレイヤーとして遊べるように!　また、LEFT 4 DEAD 2の”感染者”も敵として登場する！
 
    家庭用版での機能追加アップデート / ＲＥ．ＮＥＴ にも対応  - 　家庭用ゲーム機版で、行われた機能追加アップデートにも対応。また、無料ＷＥＢサービス ＲＥ．ＮＥＴ にも家庭用ゲーム機版同様に対応。

As a ‘hunter’, join the enemy side to become one of the game’s zombies, J’avo or other C-virus mutations and infiltrate another active game session to eliminate the human characters.

    Compatible with Console Version Feature   - The PC version is compatible with all of the latest features that have been added to the console versions, and is compatible with  too.

Med en blanding af action og survival horror lover Resident Evil 6 at være 2013's dramatiske gyseroplevelse. Favoritterne fra Resident Evil, Leon S. Kennedy, Chris Redfield og Ada Wong møder med nye karakterer, herunder Jake Muller, for sammen at stå ansigt til ansigt med en ny rædsel, den særdeles smitsomme C-virus, idet fortælling går mellem Nordamerika, den krigshærgede østeuropæiske stat, Edonia, og den kinesiske by, Lanshiang. 
 
 Med fire forskellige og alligevel sammenflettede fortællinger, som hver har sine egne par hovedpersoner til enten solo- eller co-op-spil både offline og online, leverer Resident Evil 6 ikke kun forskellige perspektiver og gameplay-stile, men, med indførelsen af den nyudviklede crossover-mekanik, vil spillere kunne gå sammen og dele uhyggen. Ved vigtige øjeblikket i spillet kan op til fire spillere deltage sammen online for at takle en specifik situation, hvor det sædvanlige partnerskab, i nogle stadier, byttes rundt på, for yderligere at øge gameplay-dybden. Centrale elementer     Gys på en global skala  – Udbruddet af C-virussen er ikke længere begrænset til en specifik beliggenhed, men verdensomspændende, og spillets action finder sted i Nordamerika, Østeuripa og Kina. Det mest ekspanderende Resident Evil-spil til dato - Oplev gyset gennem fire forskellige og alligevel sammenflettede kampagner 
 
    Crossover-gameplay  - Hver historie krydser ikke kun veje, men det gør spillets action også – Ved vigtige steder, når fortællingen bringer karakter-par sammen, tillader den helt nye crossover-mekanik at op til fire spillere oplever gyset sammen online 
 
    Solo- eller co-op-spil  – Resident Evil 6 leverer både enkelt- og to-spiller co-op-gameplay enten offline eller online (dog vil Ada Wongs kampagne kun være enkeltspiller) 
 
    Nye trusler på vej  – Konfronter C-virussens følger i alle dens varierede og dødelige former, inklusive zombier, J’avo, Chrysalids og meget mere. Agent Hunt Mode - I denne helt nye online-tilstand, til Resident Evil-serien, oplever du spillets action fra den anden side. Som en "hunter" så vær med på fjendens side og bliv til et af spillets zombier, J’avo eller andre C-virus-mutationer og infiltrer andre aktive spilsessioner for at eliminere de menneskelige karakterer
 
    Spil dig vej  – Brug skill points til at opgradere din karakter til at yde hurtigere ladehastighed, forøget ildkraft eller for at øge din livsbar med Character Skill-systemet 
 
    Rekonstrueret styringssystem  – Resident Evil 6 indeholder et udviklet styringssystem, som lader spillere skyde, mens de bevæger sig; glide; rulle i enhver retning og søge dækning sideløbende med tilføjelsen af et forbedret nærkampsangreb 
 
    Mercenaries vender tilbage  – Spillere vil endnu engang kunne nyde den yderst populære Mercenaries Mode
  
    The Mercenaries No Mercy  - En oplevelse der kun er tilgængelig på din PC. Denne ekstra tilstand er fyldt med dobbelt så mange fjender som The Mercenaries!
 
    7 ekstra stadier til "Extra Content Modes"  - Disse 7 ekstra stadier, som før kunne købes som DLC til konsol-versionen, er som standard med i PC-versionen.
 
 * Disse stadier låses op gennem præstationer.
 
    Left 4 Dead 2-overgangspatch  - Planlagt at udkomme gratis med titel-opdateringen d. 5 april 2013. Spræng dig vej gennem The Mercenaries No Mercy som dine yndlingskarakterer fra Left 4 Dead 2. Fjenderne vil også fremstå som de inficerede fra Left 4 Dead 2!
 
    Kompatibel med konsolversionens   - PC-versionen er kompatibel med alle de seneste funktioner, der er blevet tilføjet til konsol-versionerne og er også kompatibel med .

Azione e survival horror sono gli ingredienti grazie ai quali Resident Evil 6 si propone come l'esperienza horror definitiva del 2013. In questo nuovo capitolo, nuovi personaggi come Jake Muller si affiancano a icone della saga come Leon S. Kennedy, Chris Redfield e Ada Wong per affrontare un nuovo orrore, l'altamente contagioso Virus C, mentre la narrazione si sposta tra il Nord America, lo stato dell'Est Europeo Edonia devastato da una guerra e la città cinese di Lanshiang. 
 
 Con quattro storie distinte ma interconnesse, ognuna con la sua coppia di protagonisti sia in solitario e cooperativo che offline e online, Resident Evil 6 propone non solo prospettive e stili di gioco diversi, ma permetterà inoltre ai giocatori di unire le forze e condividere l'orrore, grazie all'innovativo sistema Crossover. In alcuni momenti chiave del gioco, fino a quattro giocatori potranno unire le forze online per raggiungere un obiettivo comune, con le coppie che verrano scambiate in alcune fasi per aumentare ulteriormente la profondità del gameplay. Caratteristiche principali    Orrore su scala globale  – Il Virus C, non più confinato ad un luogo specifico, si è diffuso in tutto il mondo; l'azione si svolge in America del Nord, Europa dell'Est e Cina. Il Resident Evil più vasto di sempre – Vivi l'orrore attraverso quattro campagne distinte ma interconnesse.
 
    Gameplay intrecciato  – Non saranno solo le storie a incrociarsi, ma anche l'azione: Quando la storia fa incrociare le strade di due coppie di personaggi, il nuovo sistema Crossover permette di condividere l'orrore online con altri quattro giocatori.
 
    Gioca da solo o in cooperativa  – Il gameplay di Resident Evil 6 è sia per uno che per due giocatori in cooperativa, offline o online (la campagna di Ada Wong è per un solo giocatore)
 
    Nuove minacce all'orizzonte  – Affronta i risultati del Virus C e di tutte le sue forme varie e letali, che includono zombie, J'avo, Crisalidi e molto altro. Modalità Caccia all'Agente – In questa nuova modalità online per la serie di Resident Evil, vivi l'azione dall'altro lato. Come un “cacciatore”, unisciti alla fazione nemica e diventa uno zombie, uno J'avo o un'altra mutazione del Virus C ed infiltrati in un'altra sessione di gioco attiva per eliminare tutti i personaggi umani.
 
    Gioca a modo tuo  – Usa i punti abilità per migliorare il tuo personaggio, permettendogli di ricaricare più velocemente, di infliggere più danni o di avere una barra della salute più ampia grazie al sistema di Abilità dei personaggi 
 
    Sistema di controllo ridisegnato  – Resident Evil 6 include un sistema di controllo evoluto, che permette ai giocatori di sparare in movimento, scivolare, tuffarsi in ogni direzione e mettersi al riparo, oltre ad un sistema per gli attacchi in corpo a corpo migliorato 
 
    Il ritorno dei Mercenari  – I giocatori potranno nuovamente divertirsi con la popolare ed emozionante modalità Mercenari 
 
    I Mercenari senza pietà  – Un'esperienza disponibile solo su PC. Questa modalità aggiuntiva è stracolma di nemici pronti a complicarti la vita!
 
    7 livelli aggiuntivi per i "Contenuti speciali"  – In precedenza disponibili come contenuti scaricabili per la versione console, questi 7 livelli aggiuntivi sono inclusi nella versione PC.
 * Questi livelli sono sbloccati attraverso gli obiettivi.
 
    Aggiornamento Left 4 Dead 2 Crossover  – Disponibile con l'aggiornamento del 5 aprile 2013. Fatti largo nella modalità "I Mercenari senza pietà" utilizzando il tuo personaggio preferito di Left 4 Dead 2 con gli infetti che appaiono come nemici!
 
    Compatibile con gli aggiornamenti console e   – La versione PC è compatibile con tutte le ultime funzionalità aggiuntive della modalità console ed è compatibile anche con .

    The Mercenaries No Mercy  - An experience available only on your PC, this additional mode is packed with twice as many enemies as The Mercenaries!
    7 Additional Stages for the Extra Content Modes  - Previously available for purchase as DLC for the console versions, these 7 additional stages come as *standard on the PC version.  (*These stages are unlocked via achievements.)
    Left 4 Dead 2 Crossover Patch  - Scheduled to be released for free via the April 5 2013 Title Update. Blast your way through The Mercenaries No Mercy as your favorite Left 4 Dead 2 characterswith the Infected appearing as enemies as well!
    Compatible with Console Version Feature   - The PC version is compatible with all of the latest features that have been added to the console versions, and is compatible with  too.

game.title: Dragon's Dogma: Dark Arisen
game.description:
Set in a huge open world,   Dragon’s Dogma: Dark Arisen   presents a rewarding action combat experience. Players embark on an epic adventure in a rich, living world with three AI companions, known as Pawns. These partners fight independently, demonstrating prowess and ability that they have developed based on traits learned from each player. PC users can share these Pawns online and reap rewards of treasure, tips and strategy hints for taking down the terrifying enemies. Pawns can also be borrowed when specific skills are needed to complete various challenging quests. Features    Dynamic combat experience  – Cut off the four heads of a Hydra, climb atop griffins and fight airborne, or defeat dragons and other creatures by finding out their weaknesses.
    Tons of content  – Includes all previously released DLCs, pre-order bonuses, retailer-exclusives, and the Dark Arisen expansion content. Features the highly praised combat experience and rich customization, plus a huge underground realm to explore with terrifying monsters.
    Customization options galore  – Nine different vocations for players to choose from with a variety of skill options for each, armor that can be upgraded and enhanced, plus Pawn companions that can be trained to fit your desired combat style.
    Stunning visuals  – Beautiful high res graphics with increased fidelity.
    Full Steam platform support  – Includes Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud Save, Trading Cards, Leaderboards, Big Picture Mode support
    Expanded controller support  – In addition to supporting the traditional keyboard and mouse control scheme, the game natively supports Xbox 360, Xbox One, Steam Controller, and other DirectInput-based game pads such as the DualShock controller.
    New Achievements   - 9 brand new Achievements for both new and returning Dragon’s Dogma fans!  Get ready to delve deep into Bitterblack Isle…

揉合令人振奋和深刻的战斗并广受好评的RPG动作游戏Dragon's Dogma: Dark Arisen，现玩家可以高清的画面更自由地探索于这片庞大的Gransys大陆。从9个不同级别中与三位称为Pawns的AI同伴展开你的冒险之旅。利用深层战斗系统施展毁灭性的技能与法力与传说中的怪物作战，甚至爬上它们作近距离的攻击!此游戏作为终极版本的Dragon's Dogma: Dark Arisen，已包括所有先前收费DLC内容。

揉合令人振奮和深刻的戰鬥並廣受好評的RPG動作遊戲Dragon's Dogma: Dark Arisen，現玩家可以高清的畫面更自由地探索於這片龐大的Gransys大陸。從9個不同級別中與三位稱為Pawns的AI同伴展開你的冒險之旅。利用深層戰鬥系統施展毀滅性的技能與法力與傳說中的怪物作戰，甚至爬上牠們作近距離的攻擊!此遊戲作為終極版本的Dragon's Dogma: Dark Arisen，已包括所有先前收費DLC內容。

Desarrollado en un mundo abierto de gran extensión,   Dragon’s Dogma: Dark Arisen   ofrece una gratificante experiencia de combate. Los jugadores se embarcan hacia una épica aventura en un fabuloso mundo lleno de vida junto a tres compañeros controlados por la IA y conocidos como “peones”. Estos luchan de forma independiente, demostrando habilidades y aptitudes que han desarrollado basándose en rasgos aprendidos del jugador. Los usuarios de la versión para PC pueden compartir estos peones en línea y acabar con terroríficos enemigos para hacerse con recompensas en forma de tesoros, trucos y consejos de estrategia. Los peones también te serán de utilidad cuando necesites habilidades determinadas para completar variados y exigentes retos. Características    Experiencia de combate dinámica:  Córtale las cuatro cabezas a la hidra, súbete a lomos de grifos y combate en el aire, o descubre los puntos débiles de dragones y otras criaturas para derrotarlos.
    Montones de contenidos:  Incluye todos los DLC, bonificaciones por reserva, exclusivas de minoristas y la ampliación Dark Arisen publicados anteriormente. Ofrece las elogiadas posibilidades de personalización y excelente experiencia de combate, así como un enorme reino subterráneo repleto de monstruos horripilantes por explorar.
    Todo tipo de opciones de personalización:  Nueve vocaciones diferentes a disposición del jugador, con gran variedad de opciones de habilidades en cada una, armaduras que pueden subirse de nivel y mejorarse, además de compañeros (“peones”) que pueden entrenarse para adaptarse a tu estilo de combate preferido.
    Gráficos increíbles:  Hermosos gráficos de alta resolución con mayor fidelidad.
    Totalmente compatible con la plataforma Steam:  Compatibilidad con logros de Steam, partidas guardadas en la nube de Steam, cromos, clasificaciones y modo Big Picture.
    Mayor compatibilidad con mandos:  Además de los tradicionales controles con teclado o ratón, el juego es compatible de forma nativa con los mandos de Xbox 360 y Xbox One, Steam Controller, así como otros mandos basados en DirectInput, como el mando inalámbrico DUALSHOCK.
    Nuevos logros:  9 flamantes nuevos logros tanto para los más novatos como para los ya veteranos de Dragon’s Dogma. Prepárate para adentrarte en las profundidades de la isla Bitterblack…

Situé dans un énorme monde ouvert,   Dragon’s Dogma: Dark Arisen   offre une expérience de combat/action exceptionnelle. Les joueurs se lanceront dans une véritable épopée au cœur d'un monde vivant et riche, accompagnés de trois compagnons IA qu'on appelle les pions. Ces partenaires combattent indépendamment et font preuve d'aptitudes et de prouesses qu'ils développent en fonction des compétences de chaque joueur. Les joueurs sur PC peuvent partager ces Pions en ligne et engranger des trésors ou obtenir des astuces et des stratégies pour venir à bout d'ennemis terrifiants. Les Pions peuvent aussi être empruntés lorsque vous devez disposer de compétences précises pour mener à bien certaines quêtes particulièrement difficiles. Caractéristiques    Des combats dynamiques  – Tranchez les quatre têtes d'une hydre, chevauchez des griffons et combattez dans les cieux, ou triomphez de dragons et autres monstres en découvrant leurs points faibles. 
    Un contenu incroyable  – Comprend tous les DLC déjà sortis, les bonus de précommande, les exclusivités et l'extension Dark Arisen. Découvrez par vous-même les combats dynamiques et les options de personnalisation encensés par la critique. En bonus, un gigantesque royaume souterrain à explorer, peuplé de monstres effroyables.
    Des options de personnalisation en pagaille  – Neuf vocations au choix dotées chacune d'une palette de compétences, des armures qui peuvent être améliorées et renforcées, sans oublier les Pions que vous pouvez former à votre style de combat.
    Des graphismes époustouflants  – De magnifiques graphismes haute résolution, à la fidélité optimisée.
    Compatibilité complète avec la plateforme Steam  – Comprend les Succès Steam, la sauvegarde sur le Steam Cloud, les Cartes à échanger, les Classements, la prise en charge du mode Big Picture.
    Compatibilité accrue avec les manettes  – Outre la prise en charge du traditionnel duo clavier-souris, le jeu gère de manière native les manettes Xbox 360, Xbox One et Steam ainsi que les manettes basées sur DirectInput telles que la manette DualShock.
    Nouveaux Succès   - 9 nouveaux Succès pour tous les fans de Dragon's Dogma, baroudeurs ou débutants !  Préparez-vous à plonger dans les profondeurs du Récif de l'Amertume...

Die riesige offene Welt von   Dragon’s Dogma: Dark Arisen   wartet mit einem fantastischen, actiongeladenen Kampferlebnis auf. Die Spieler begeben sich in einer umfangreichen, lebendigen Welt zusammen mit drei KI-Begleitern, genannt Vasallen, auf ein episches Abenteuer. Diese Partner kämpfen selbstständig und stellen dabei ihr Kampfgeschick und ihre Fähigkeiten unter Beweis, die auf Eigenschaften basieren, welche sie von dem jeweiligen Spieler erlernt haben. PC-Spieler können diese Vasallen online teilen, um Schätze, Tipps und Strategiehinweise zu verdienen, mit deren Hilfe sie die furchterregenden Feinde bezwingen. Es ist auch möglich, Vasallen auszuleihen, sollten einmal spezielle Fertigkeiten benötigt werden, um verschiedene anspruchsvolle Aufgaben abzuschließen. Spieleigenschaften    Dynamisches Kampferlebnis  – Schlage einer Hydra ihre vier Köpfe ab, schwinge dich auf Greifen und kämpfe in der Luft oder besiege Drachen und andere Kreaturen, indem du hinter ihre Schwächen kommst.
    Haufenweise Inhalte  – Umfasst alle bisher veröffentlichten herunterladbaren Inhalte, Vorbestellerboni, exklusiven Händlerangebote und die Erweiterungsinhalte von Dark Arisen. Bietet das hochgelobte Kampferlebnis und umfassende Anpassungsoptionen sowie ein riesiges, unterirdisches Reich voller furchterregender Monster, das es zu erkunden gilt.
    Unzählige Anpassungsmöglichkeiten  – Die Spieler können aus neun unterschiedlichen Laufbahnen wählen, jede mit einer eigenen Auswahl an Fertigkeitenoptionen, erweiter- und verbesserbarer Rüstung sowie Vasallen-Begleitern, die so ausgebildet werden können, dass sie dem eigenen bevorzugten Kampfstil entsprechen.
    Atemberaubende Grafik  – Wunderschöne, detailliertere Grafik mit hoher Auflösung.
    Vollständige Unterstützung der Steam-Plattform  – Unterstützt auch Steam-Errungenschaften, Speicherung in der Steam Cloud, Sammelkarten, Bestenlisten und den Modus Big Picture.
    Erweiterte Controller-Unterstützung  – Das Spiel unterstützt neben der traditionellen Steuerung durch Tastatur und Maus auch standardmäßig den Controller der Xbox 360, Xbox One, den Steam Controller und andere Spielcontroller, die DirectInput nutzen, wie etwa den DUALSHOCK-Controller.
    Neue Erfolge  – Neun brandneue Erfolge für neue und alteingesessene Fans von Dragon’s Dogma! Mach dich bereit, tief in die Insel Finstergram vorzustoßen …

Set in a huge open world,   Dragon’s Dogma: Dark Arisen   presents a rewarding action combat experience. Players embark on an epic adventure in a rich, living world with three AI companions, known as Pawns. These partners fight independently, demonstrating prowess and ability that they have developed based on traits learned from each player. PC users can share these Pawns online and reap rewards of treasure, tips and strategy hints for taking down the terrifying enemies. Pawns can also be borrowed when specific skills are needed to complete various challenging quests. Features    Dynamic combat experience  – Cut off the four heads of a Hydra, climb atop griffins and fight airborne, or defeat dragons and other creatures by finding out their weaknesses.
    Tons of content  – Includes all previously released DLCs, pre-order bonuses, retailer-exclusives, and the Dark Arisen expansion content. Features the highly praised combat experience and rich customization, plus a huge underground realm to explore with terrifying monsters.
    Customization options galore  – Nine different vocations for players to choose from with a variety of skill options for each, armor that can be upgraded and enhanced, plus Pawn companions that can be trained to fit your desired combat style.
    Stunning visuals  – Beautiful high res graphics with increased fidelity.
    Full Steam platform support  – Includes Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud Save, Trading Cards, Leaderboards, Big Picture Mode support
    Expanded controller support  – In addition to supporting the traditional keyboard and mouse control scheme, the game natively supports Xbox 360, Xbox One, Steam Controller, and other DirectInput-based game pads such as the DualShock controller.
    New Achievements   - 9 brand new Achievements for both new and returning Dragon’s Dogma fans!  Get ready to delve deep into Bitterblack Isle…

思い描いた冒険が、甦る。
 

 
胸躍る大冒険が待つ、ファンタジーの世界へ。
 
「ドラゴンズドグマ：ダークアリズン」が高解像度化を実現し登場！
 
心臓を奪ったドラゴンを倒す運命を課せられた者、覚者の壮大な冒険を描く『ドラゴンズドグマ：ダークアリズン』。広大なオープンワールド“グランシス地方”や、大規模コンテンツ“黒呪島”など、緻密でありながら果てしないハイファンタジーの世界で紡がれる物語が高解像度で甦る。さらに、『ドラゴンズドグマ：ダークアリズン』の有料DLCも収録した、まさに決定版。様々なモンスターを相手に、掴む、よじ登るなど、自由でリアルな戦い。そして、仲間のポーンと協力したかつてないパーティーアクション。思い描いたアクションを実現できた時の驚きや興奮が、再び味わえる。

Ambientato in un open world enorme,   Dragon's Dogma: Dark Arisen   offre un'azione di combattimento gratificante che farà imbarcare i giocatori in un'avventura epica in un mondo ricco e pieno di vita, insieme a tre compagni online controllati dall'IA, detti "pedine". Questi compagni combattono indipendentemente, dimostrando prodezza e abilità sviluppate in base agli elementi appresi da ciascun giocatore. Gli utenti su PC potranno condividere queste pedine online per fare il pieno di ricompense e ottenere tesori, suggerimenti e consigli strategici con cui eliminare nemici spaventosi. Inoltre le pedine potranno essere prese in prestito quando c'è bisogno di abilità specifiche per completare varie missioni avvincenti. Caratteristiche    Esperienza di combattimento dinamico  – Staccate le quattro teste dell'idra, salite sul dorso dei grifoni per i combattimenti aerei, o sconfiggete draghi e altre creature scoprendo i loro punti deboli.
    Un'infinità di contenuti  – Include tutti i contenuti scaricabili già pubblicati, bonus di pre-ordine, esclusive per rivenditori e il contenuto dell'espansione Dark Arisen. Il gioco offre un'esperienza di combattimento molto apprezzata, con tanti elementi da personalizzare e un regno sotterraneo enorme da esplorare, pieno di mostri terrificanti.
    Opzioni di personalizzazione a bizzeffe  – Nove classi diverse tra cui scegliere, con una varietà di abilità per ognuna, armature da potenziare e pedine da addestrare per adattarle al proprio stile di combattimento.
    Grafica sbalorditiva  – Grafica meravigliosa ad alta risoluzione, caratterizzata da maggiore precisione.
    Pieno supporto per la piattaforma Steam  – Include obiettivi Steam, salvataggio su Steam Cloud, carte da scambiare, classifiche, modalità Big Picture.
    Maggiore supporto per controller  – Oltre allo schema di controllo tradizionale con tastiera e mouse, il gioco supporta i controller Steam, Xbox 360, Xbox One e altri gamepad basati su DirectInput, come il controller wireless DUALSHOCK®.
    Nuovi obiettivi  - 9 obiettivi nuovissimi per fan nuovi e veterani di Dragon’s Dogma!  Preparatevi a esplorare l'Isola di Nerabisso...

game.title: Halo: Combat Evolved
game.description:
Bent on Humankind's extermination, a powerful fellowship of alien races known as the Covenant is wiping out Earth's fledgling interstellar empire. Climb into the boots of Master Chief, a biologically altered super-soldier, as you and the other surviving defenders of a devastated colony-world make a desperate attempt to lure the alien fleet away from earth. Shot down and marooned on the ancient ring-world Halo, you begin a guerilla-war against the Covenant. Fight for humanity against an alien onslaught as you race to uncover the mysteries of Halo.

After the fall of Reach, The Pillar of Autumn, the only surviving human ship, makes a random slip-space jump away from the planet, so as not to lead the Covenant to Earth. When the Autumn drops out of slip-space, they find themselves next to a large, artificial, ring-world. A Covenant fleet hiding behind the adjacent planet engages the Autumn, the biologically augmented super-soldier John 117, or the Master Chief, is taken out of cryostasis. He proceeds to the bridge while fighting hordes of boarding Covenant forces. The Master Chief retrieves the ship-board AI (Artificial Intelligence) Cortana from the Captain of the vessel, Captain Keyes. The Chief and Cortana board an escape craft and begin to drop towards the surface of the ring-world. The Chief is the only one in his escape pod to survive the impact, and sneaks away from the crash site. After gathering all the survivors from the Autumn, the Chief makes an attack run on a Covenant ship in order to save Captain Keyes. Keyes tells the Chief and Cortana that the Covenant call this world Halo. Cortana realizes that it has

game.title: Mister Mosquito
game.description: The Yamada family will never know what bit them. You are Mister Mosquito, an uninvited guest in the Yamada's family home in Japan. In order to store up enough food for the coming winter, you will need to drink as much of their precious blood as possible while they are in bed, talking on the phone, watching tv, or even taking a bath. The Yamada family knows you are in the house, and they have plans to take you out. Deadly insecticides fill the air, and members of the family have the ability to crush you like a bug. You want a taste of their plasma. They want you dead. Something's gotta give.

game.title: The Lord of the Rings: Fate of the Fellowship
game.description:
As members of The Fellowship and the allies who rise to aid them, you must embark on a journey that may either save or doom Middle-earth. Navigate a world beset by shadow, where every choice forges a new path. The threads of destiny weave together, and the fate of The Free Peoples lies in your valor, friendship, and resolve. Will the One Ring be cast into the fire, or will the bearer be lost to despair?

The Lord of the Rings: Fate of the Fellowship is a co-operative game in which each player controls two characters, lending their unique abilities to protect Frodo, battle enemies in pivotal locations, and evade the menacing Nazgûl and Sauron's searching Eye.

Each playthrough presents new challenges with 24 different objectives, 14 events, and 13 playable characters. The game is won if the group destroys the One Ring before Frodo loses all hope.

A solo adventure is included.

game.title: Metal Warriors
game.description:
Metal Warriors is a 1995 action platformer video game developed by LucasArts and published by Konami for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System. The game was released exclusively in North America in April of 1995.

Its gameplay mainly consists of action and shooting mixed with mission-based exploration using a main seven-button configuration.

Metal Warriors takes place in the year 2102, where the United Earth Government is under siege from the Dark Axis military force led by the dictator Venkar Amon, who has waged a war against them for three years on Earth, however the titular freedom-fighting group equipped with robotic combat suits are the few remaining people defending the planet. Assuming the role of lieutenant Stone,[4] players control him through a variety of missions that initially are set in space and completing objectives such as rescuing agent Marissa from Axis 5 and capturing both an enemy supply ship and a heavily guarded asteroid base in order to obtain vital resources for the group, with the latter proving to be successful enough to promote Stone from lieutenant to captain of his crew.[11] However their recent success quickly attracts the attention of the Axis army, who engage in attacking the group's main ship with threatening enemy fire that Stone and his crew must defend with the stolen Prometheus units.[11]

After the recent event, the group is tasked with disabling an anti-spacecraft cannon located in Alaska to ensure safe landing for air operations that would eventually lead to the removal of Axis forces on Earth. After stealing the experimental flying Drache machine from a jungle facility on Chile, fighting through the bombed-out Dorado city, capturing subterranean mining Axis installations and obtaining a command key from an enemy communication tower, the group finally reaches the Axis command center where a super weapon is rumored to be in construction, with Stone and his crew leading the final assault.[11][12][13][14] Once Stone reaches the depths of the center, he confronts Venkar Amon and defeats his super weapon in a battle between fully mobile flying armored suits, however Amon tries to escape with a hijacked Nitro suit but he dies incinerated alongside the base. Stone safely escapes from the explosion but his Nitro suit is wrecked after landing on the ground, marking an end for both Dark Axis and the war.

game.title: Terracards
game.description:
🌾 Create, Cultivate, Profit! 
 You've inherited your grandfather's farm, which has been reduced to a lone island amidst a relentless sea. With nothing but a deck of cards and the entrepreneurial spirit, you are tasked to pay off a mounting debt, turning this desolate patch of land into a thriving agrarian empire.
 
  Each card you play represents different elements of your farm - from the crops you sow, the animals you raise, to the structures you build. 
 
        💰 Choose, Produce, Profit! 
 Every few turns choose between unique cards, and buffs
 
 Generate items each turn, sell them for cash, and invest this money to expand your farm, pay off fees, and gradually chip away at the enormous debt.
  the challenge is to maximize efficiency and make as much money as possible.

localized_description.text:
🌾 Create, Cultivate, Profit! 
 You've inherited your grandfather's farm, which has been reduced to a lone island amidst a relentless sea. With nothing but a deck of cards and the entrepreneurial spirit, you are tasked to pay off a mounting debt, turning this desolate patch of land into a thriving agrarian empire.
 
  Each card you play represents different elements of your farm - from the crops you sow, the animals you raise, to the structures you build. 
 
        💰 Choose, Produce, Profit! 
 Every few turns choose between unique cards, and buffs
 
 Generate items each turn, sell them for cash, and invest this money to expand your farm, pay off fees, and gradually chip away at the enormous debt.
  the challenge is to maximize efficiency and make as much money as possible.

🌾 ¡Crea, Cultiva, Rentabiliza!  
 Has heredado la granja de tu abuelo, que se ha reducido a una solitaria isla en medio de un mar implacable. Con nada más que un mazo de cartas y el espíritu emprendedor, tu tarea es pagar una creciente deuda, convirtiendo este desolado terreno en un próspero imperio agrícola.
 
  Cada carta que juegas representa diferentes elementos de tu granja - desde los cultivos que siembras, los animales que crías, hasta las estructuras que construyes. 
 
        💰 ¡Elige, Produce, Rentabiliza!  
 Cada pocos turnos elige entre cartas únicas y potenciadores.
 
 Genera ítems en cada turno, véndelos por dinero y reinvierte este capital para expandir tu granja, pagar tarifas y reducir gradualmente la enorme deuda.
  El desafío es maximizar la eficiencia y generar la mayor cantidad de dinero posible.

🌾Créez, Cultivez, Profitez ! 
 Vous avez hérité de la ferme de votre grand-père, réduite à une île solitaire au milieu d'une mer impitoyable. Avec rien de plus qu'un jeu de cartes et un esprit entrepreneurial, votre tâche consiste à rembourser une dette croissante, transformant ce lopin de terre désolé en un empire agraire florissant.
 
  Chaque carte que vous jouez représente différents éléments de votre ferme - des cultures que vous semez, des animaux que vous élevez, aux structures que vous construisez. 
 
        💰Choisissez, Produisez, Profitez! 
 Tous les quelques tours, choisissez parmi des cartes uniques et des améliorations
 
 Générez des objets à chaque tour, vendez-les pour de l'argent et investissez cet argent pour agrandir votre ferme, payer les frais et réduire progressivement l'énorme dette.
  Le défi est de maximiser l'efficacité et de gagner autant d'argent que possible.

🌾 Erschaffen, Kultivieren, Profitieren!  
 Sie haben den Bauernhof Ihres Großvaters geerbt, der zu einer einsamen Insel inmitten eines unerbittlichen Meeres reduziert wurde. Ausgestattet mit nichts weiter als einem Kartenspiel und Unternehmergeist, sind Sie beauftragt, eine ansteigende Schuld zu begleichen und dieses öde Stück Land in ein blühendes Agrarimperium zu verwandeln.
 
  Jede Karte, die Sie spielen, repräsentiert unterschiedliche Elemente Ihrer Farm - von den Kulturen, die Sie säen, den Tieren, die Sie aufziehen, bis hin zu den Strukturen, die Sie bauen. 
 
        💰 Wählen, Produzieren, Profitieren!  
 Wählen Sie alle paar Runden zwischen einzigartigen Karten und Verbesserungen aus.
 
 Erzeugen Sie in jeder Runde Artikel, verkaufen Sie diese gegen Bargeld und investieren Sie dieses Geld, um Ihre Farm auszubauen, Gebühren zu begleichen und nach und nach die enorme Schuld abzubauen.
  Die Herausforderung besteht darin, die Effizienz zu maximieren und so viel Geld wie möglich zu verdienen.

🌾 Crea, Coltiva, Guadagna!  
 Hai ereditato la fattoria di tuo nonno, che è stata ridotta a un'isola solitaria in mezzo a un mare implacabile. Con nulla se non un mazzo di carte e lo spirito imprenditoriale, ti viene affidato il compito di estinguere un debito crescente, trasformando questo desolato appezzamento di terra in un fiorente impero agricolo.
 
  Ogni carta che giochi rappresenta diversi elementi della tua fattoria - dalle colture che semini, agli animali che allevi, alle strutture che costruisci. 
 
        💰 Scegli, Produci, Guadagna!  
 Ogni pochi turni scegli tra carte uniche e bonus
 
 Genera oggetti ogni turno, vendili per ottenere denaro, e investi questi soldi per espandere la tua fattoria, pagare le spese, e gradualmente ridurre l'enorme debito.
  La sfida è massimizzare l'efficienza e guadagnare quanto più denaro possibile.

game.description: Dragon Cave is an online adoptables game. Collect eggs, raise them to adulthood, and then breed them to create interesting lineages.

game.title: Red Dead Redemption
game.description:
A port for several platforms. It lacks the multiplayer modes present in the original release.

In 1911, former outlaw John Marston is forced by government agents to hunt down members of his old gang to secure his family's freedom. His journey takes him across the American frontier and into Mexico, where he becomes entangled in a civil war while pursuing his targets. Along the way, John allies with various characters to complete his mission. Ultimately, he faces challenges that test his resolve and his desire for redemption.

game.title: Hades II
game.description:
Battle beyond the Underworld using dark sorcery to take on the Titan of Time in this bewitching sequel to the award-winning rogue-like dungeon crawler.

As the immortal Princess of the Underworld, you'll explore a bigger, deeper mythic world, vanquishing the forces of the Titan of Time with the full might of Olympus behind you, in a sweeping story that continually unfolds through your every setback and accomplishment. New locations, challenges, upgrade systems, and surprises await as you delve into the ever-shifting Underworld again and again.

game.title: Slime Rancher
game.description:
Slime Rancher is a charming, first-person, sandbox experience. Play as Beatrix LeBeau: a plucky, young rancher who sets out for a life a thousand light years away from Earth on the 'Far, Far Range.' Each day will present new challenges and risky opportunities as you attempt to amass a great fortune in the business of slime ranching. Collect colorful slimes, grow crops, harvest resources, and explore the untamed wilds through the mastery of your all-purpose vacpack.

Slime Rancher is the tale of Beatrix LeBeau, a plucky, young rancher who sets out for a life a thousand light years away from Earth on the ‘Far, Far Range’ where she tries her hand at making a living wrangling slimes.

game.title: Exit
game.description: Exit is a action/puzzle game, first released in Japan and later in other parts of the world. The basic premise is to lead the main character Mr. ESC, an escapologist, out of hospitals, underground facilities, offices and other buildings within the given time limit. Along the way, the player will be hindered by obstacles such as fires, earthquakes, floods, or even meteor showers. Sometimes the player must also help trapped individuals escape, which will take quick thinking and planning ahead to exit the building successfully.

game.title: The Last of Us Part I
game.description:
Experience the emotional storytelling and unforgettable characters of Joel and Ellie in The Last of Us, winner of over 200 Game of the Year awards and now rebuilt for PlayStation 5.

Enjoy a total overhaul of the original experience, faithfully reproduced but incorporating modernized gameplay, improved controls and expanded accessibility options. Plus, feel immersed with improved effects and enhanced exploration and combat.

It also includes the Left Behind story DLC.

Twenty years after a mutated fungus started turning people all over the world into deadly zombies, humans become an endangered species. Joel, a Texan in his forties with the "emotional range of a teaspoon" (to quote Hermione from Harry Potter), finds himself responsible with the safety of a fourteen year old girl named Ellie whom he must smuggle to a militia group called the Fireflies. And as if the infected aren't enough of a hassle, they also have to deal with the authorities who wouldn't let them leave the quarantine zone, as well as other survivors capable of killing anyone who might have something useful in their backpacks.

game.title: Don't Starve
game.description:
Don’t Starve is an uncompromising wilderness survival game full of science and magic.

You play as Wilson, an intrepid Gentleman Scientist who has been trapped by a demon and transported to a mysterious wilderness world. Wilson must learn to exploit his environment and its inhabitants if he ever hopes to escape and find his way back home.

Enter a strange and unexplored world full of strange creatures, dangers, and surprises. Gather resources to craft items and structures that match your survival style. Play your way as you unravel the mysteries of this strange land.

game.title: Where the Water Tastes Like Wine
game.description:
Where the Water Tastes Like Wine is a Narrative-Adventure game about traveling, sharing stories, and surviving manifest destiny. Featuring gorgeous hand-drawn illustrations, Where the Water Tastes Like Wine combines 2D visuals with a 3D overworld US map.

Players wander across a folkloric Depression era United States at their own pace, meeting strangers with their own stories to tell. Through these interactions, players will be able to collect unique stories which can then be re-told to unlock new interactions. In this way the in-game stories themselves act as a currency to progress through the game, and it’s up to the player to pair the right story with the unique needs of each of the characters that you will encounter throughout your travels. Only through these right pairings will characters reveal their true selves, and bestow you with the most powerful stories, the true ones which reveal something about their own lives. In Where The Water Tastes Like Wine, stories organically take on a life of their own as they grow larger and transform as they're told- and re-told.

In this way the in-game stories themselves act as a currency to progress through the game, and it’s up to the player to pair the right story with the unique needs of each of the characters that you will encounter throughout your travels. Only through these right pairings will characters reveal their true selves, and bestow you with the most powerful stories, the true ones which reveal something about their own lives. In Where The Water Tastes Like Wine, stories organically take on a life of their own as they grow larger and transform as they're told- and re-told.
game.display_title: Where the Water Tastes Like Wine

game.title: Journey
game.description:
A third-person adventure game in which the player, controlling a robed figure, makes a pilgrimage through a desert landscape to a rugged mountain with a beacon of light in the distance while uncovering the history of their people, rescuing and cooperating with friendly creatures, avoiding predatory ones and communicating with other travelers.

Journey‍ '​s story is told wordlessly through in-game and pre-rendered cutscenes. The player's character begins on a sand dune in a seemingly endless desert. In the far distance looms a large, foreboding mountain with a glowing crevice that splits its peak. As the character approaches the mountain, they find remnants of a once-thriving civilization, eroded by sand over time. Scattered throughout the ruins at the end of each area are stones at which the traveler rests; these give the traveler the vision of meeting a larger, white-robed figure in a circular room, with art on the walls describing the rise and fall of the civilization, mirroring the player's journey.

The player continues to journey deeper into the remains of a once sprawling city at the base of the mountain. Eventually making it safely to the mountain, the traveler begins to climb it, struggling as they enter the colder climates and encounter deep snow and high winds. With the crevice still a fair distance away, the traveler falls and collapses in the snow. Six of the white-robed figures appear and grant the traveler new energy, allowing the player to reach the summit of the mountain and walk into and through the crevice as the screen fills with white. The player is then shown the game's credits, playing over the ending cinematic. This cinematic shows a shooting star emanating from the crevice and traversing the path the traveler took through the ruins, and shows glimpses of other robed travelers heading towards the mountain. Eventually, the star comes to rest at the sand dune where the game began, and the player is given the option of starting the game again. As the credits end, the player is shown the PlayStation Network IDs of the other travelers who shared part of the trek.

game.title: Neon White
game.description:
Neon White is a lightning fast first-person action game about exterminating demons in Heaven. You are White, an assassin handpicked from Hell to compete with other demon slayers for a chance to live permanently in Heaven. The other assassins seem familiar, though… did you know them in a past life?

You are Neon White, an assassin handpicked from Hell to compete with other demon slayers for a chance to live permanently in Heaven - Only the fastest slayer can stay.

localized_description.text:
Neon White is a lightning fast first-person action game about exterminating demons in Heaven. You are White, an assassin handpicked from Hell to compete with other demon slayers for a chance to live permanently in Heaven. The other assassins seem familiar, though… did you know them in a past life?

You are Neon White, an assassin handpicked from Hell to compete with other demon slayers for a chance to live permanently in Heaven - Only the fastest slayer can stay.
由Ben Esposito开发的第一人称动作平台游戏《Neon White》预计于今冬登陆NS&Steam平台！你在游戏中的使命是消灭天堂里的恶魔。你将化身为来自地狱的刺客 White，与其他屠魔者争夺永居天堂的一线机会。其他刺客看起来都有点眼熟，但是...他们是否都是你前世所熟识的人？

Neon White is a lightning fast first-person action game about exterminating demons in Heaven. You are White, an assassin handpicked from Hell to compete with other demon slayers for a chance to live permanently in Heaven. The other assassins seem familiar, though…
 
Features: 
 
 • You play as Neon White, an assassin plucked from Hell to compete with other demon slayers for a shot at redemption.
 • Collect “Soul Cards” to attack your foes or discard them to use unique movement abilities.
 • Compete for the best times by cleverly combining cards to discover massive shortcuts.
• Uncover Heaven’s mysteries by getting to know the other assassins… did you know them in a past life?

Neon White es un frenético juego de acción en primera persona sobre el exterminio de los demonios en el cielo. Encarnarás a White, un asesino del infierno que deberá competir con otros asesinos de demonios por la oportunidad de vivir para siempre en el cielo. Sin embargo, los otros asesinos te resultan familiares... ¿los conociste en una vida pasada?

- Encarnarás a Neon White, un asesino sacado del infierno que deberá competir con otros asesinos de demonios por una oportunidad de redención.
- Colecciona “cartas de alma” para atacar a tus enemigos o descártalas para usar habilidades de movimiento únicas.
- Compite por lograr el mejor tiempo combinando cartas de forma inteligente para descubrir grandes atajos.
- Descubre los misterios del cielo mientras conoces a los demás asesinos... ¿Los conociste en una vida pasada?

Neon White est un jeu d'action rapide en vue subjective dans lequel tu dois éliminer des démons au paradis. Tu es White, un assassin sélectionné en enfer qui doit affronter d'autres tueurs de démons pour espérer pouvoir rester vivre au paradis. Mais les autres assassins te semblent familiers... les as-tu rencontrés dans une autre vie ?

- Tu incarnes Neon White, un assassin sauvé de l'enfer qui doit affronter d'autres tueurs de démons pour espérer la rédemption.
- Collecte des « cartes d'Âme » pour attaquer tes ennemis ou défausse-les pour utiliser des coups uniques.
- Bats-toi pour les records en réussissant les bonnes combinaisons de cartes pour découvrir d'énormes raccourcis.
- Révèle les mystères du paradis en apprenant à connaître les autres assassins… les as-tu rencontrés dans une autre vie ?

Neon White ist ein blitzschnelles Actionspiel aus der Ich-Perspektive, in dem es um die Vernichtung von Dämonen im Himmel geht. Du bist White, ein Attentäter, der aus der Hölle auserwählt wurde, um mit anderen Dämonenkillern um eine Chance zu konkurrieren, dauerhaft im Himmel zu leben. Die anderen Attentäter kommen dir allerdings bekannt vor ... hast du sie in einem früheren Leben gekannt?

- Du spielst Neon White, einen Attentäter, der aus der Hölle geholt wurde, um mit anderen Dämonenkillern um eine Chance auf Erlösung zu kämpfen.
- Sammle „Seelenkarten“, um deine Feinde anzugreifen, oder lege sie ab, um einzigartige Bewegungsfähigkeiten zu nutzen.
- Kämpfe um Bestzeiten, indem du die Karten geschickt kombinierst und so gewaltige Abkürzungen entdeckst.
- Entdecke die Geheimnisse des Himmels, indem du die anderen Attentäter kennenlernst ... kanntest du sie in einem früheren Leben?

Neon White é um jogo de ação na primeira pessoa incrivelmente rápido sobre eliminar demónios no Céu. És White, um assassino criteriosamente escolhido do Inferno para competir com outros assassinos de demónios numa luta pela possibilidade de viver para sempre no Céu. Mas os outros assassinos parecem familiares... terás conhecido algum numa vida passada?

- Jogas como Neon White, um assassino retirado do Inferno para competir com outros assassinos de demónios numa luta pela redenção.
- Recolhe "Cartas de Alma" para atacares os teus inimigos, ou sacrifica-as para usares habilidades únicas.
- Compete pelos melhores tempos com combinações inteligentes de cartas para descobrires atalhos surpreendentes.
- Desvenda os mistérios do Céu ao conhecer melhor os outros assassinos... terás conhecido algum numa vida passada?

Neon White è un action platform a ritmo mozzafiato in prima persona nel quale annienterai i demoni del paradiso. Gioca nei panni di White, un assassino scelto dall'inferno per contendersi con altri cacciatori di demoni la possibilità di vivere per sempre in paradiso. Gli altri assassini, però, hanno un che di familiare... vi siete già incontrati in una vita passata?

- Gioca nei panni di Neon White, un assassino pescato dall'inferno per contendersi la rendenzione con altri cacciatori di demoni.
- Colleziona le "carte dell'anima" con cui attaccare i tuoi nemici o scartale in favore di abilità di movimento uniche.
- Punta al tempo migliore combinando ingegnosamente le carte per scoprire velocissime scorciatoie.
- Scopri i segreti del paradiso approfondendo la conoscenza degli altri assassini… li hai già incontrati in una vita passata?

game.title: Age of Empires II: The Age of Kings
game.description:
Take control of a powerful civilization. Lead them through 1000 years of the Middle Ages to riches and greatness. Will you Intimidate the world into following you by using military force? Rule the world with honor and nobility by using commerce and diplomacy? Or Underhandedly seize power through conspiracy, deception and regicide? There are many paths to power, there can only be one ruler!

Age of Empires II is a real-time strategy game that focuses on building towns, gathering resources, and creating armies to defeat opponents. Players conquer rival towns and empires as they advance one of 13 civilizations through four "Ages": the Dark Age, the Feudal Age, the Castle Age (being the High Middle Ages), and the Imperial Age, reminiscent of the Renaissance—a 1000-year timeframe. Advancing to a new Age unlocks new units, structures, and technologies, but players must first build certain buildings from their current age and then pay a sum of resources (typically food and gold).

game.title: Super Mario Galaxy
game.description:
A 3D platformer and first Wii entry in the Super Mario franchise, Super Mario Galaxy sees Mario jump across planets and galaxies with varying items, enemies, geographies and gravity mechanics in order to reach his enemy Bowser, who has attacked the Mushroom Kingdom and hijacked Princess Peach's castle with her inside.

Every hundred years, a huge comet flies by in the skies above the Mushroom Kingdom. One year, that comet filled the entire sky, and from it fell a stream of shooting stars. The Toads scooped up the Star Bits and brought them to the castle, where they were reborn as a great Power Star. It was a happy time in the Mushroom Kingdom. Then one night Mario received a letter...

“Dear Mario,
I’ll be waiting for you at the castle on the night of the Star Festival. There’s something I’d like to give you.
from Peach”

With invitation in hand, Mario headed off to the castle just as the Star Festival was getting into full swing. Surrounded by Toads gleefully trying to catch falling Star Bits, Mario was looking forward to the night’s festivities. But then, something happened...

game.title: Paradise Killer
game.description: Paradise Island, a world outside reality. There’s been a murder that only "investigation freak" Lady Love Dies can solve. Gather evidence and interrogate suspects in this open world adventure. You can accuse anyone, but you’ll have to prove your case in trial to convict. It’s up to you to decide who’s guilty.

movie.title: Jurassic Park
movie.description: A wealthy entrepreneur secretly creates a theme park featuring living dinosaurs drawn from prehistoric DNA. Before opening day, he invites a team of experts and his two eager grandchildren to experience the park and help calm anxious investors. However, the park is anything but amusing as the security systems go off-line and the dinosaurs escape.

localized_title.text: Jurassic Park: O Parque dos Dinossauros

localized_description.text: Il ricchissimo industriale John Hammond è riuscito a costruire un parco dei divertimenti a tema incentrato sui dinosauri (riportati in vita grazie ad una complessa operazione di ingegneria genetica), il "Jurassic Park". Hammond invita alcuni esperti e scienziati a compiere un sopralluogo nell'isola dove il parco è allestito e a stilare una perizia positiva che gli permetta di ottenere i finanziamenti di cui ha bisogno. Ma qualcosa va storto: a causa di una tempesta, il sistema di controllo computerizzato del parco va fuori uso, i dinosauri rompono i recinti in cui sono rinchiusi e impazzano liberi dando la caccia agli umani...

Den excentriske millionær John Hammond inviterer to dinosauruseksperter til sin forlystelsespark på en ø ud for Costa Ricas kyst. Ved at klone DNA fra forhistoriske insekter har han skabt levende dinosauruser. Sammen med Hammonds to børnebørn og kaosteoretikeren Ian Malcolm får de to eksperter en tur gennem parken i en computerstyret bil. Undervejs bliver øen ramt af en tropisk storm. Strømsvigt for de store dyr til at gå amok.

Obra-prima de Steven Spielberg, filme vencedor de 3 Óscares. Através do ADN de um extinto dinossauro, um grupo de cientistas consegue repovoar uma ilha remota com estas criaturas e construir um parque temático com dinossauros vivos. Mas uma falha de segurança faz com que os dinossauros escapem com resultados catastróficos. Os cinco sobreviventes terão de lutar com todas as suas forças para sobreviver no meio dos predadores pré-históricos.

John Hammond, ein reicher Unternehmer, errichtet auf einer einsamen Insel heimlich einen Erlebnispark, der für seine Gäste außergewöhnliche Attraktionen bereithält. Es ist gelungen, aus einer urzeitlichen DNA leibhaftige Dinosaurier ins Leben zu rufen. Bevor der Park für das Publikum geöffnet wird, lädt er einen führenden Paläontologen, dessen Freundin, eine Paläobotanikerin, einen berühmten Mathematiker und seine beiden wißbegierigen Enkel ein, um die besorgten Investoren zu beruhigen. Aber der Besuch seiner ersten Gäste verläuft alles andere als nach Plan. Die urzeitlichen Monster brechen aus, entziehen sich jeder Kontrolle und starten eine mörderische Jagd auf ihre Schöpfer ...

Généticien de génie, le professeur John Hammond a recréé de nombreuses espèces de dinosaures à partir d'une goutte de sang prélevée sur un moustique fossilisé. Démiurge naïf et généreux, dépassé par ses propres ambitions, il projette d’ouvrir un gigantesque et terrifiant parc d'attractions. Mais la pureté de son rêve se heurte à la cupidité des hommes et, plus grave, à la violence latente, indomptable de la Nature.

El multimillonario John Hammond tiene una idea para un espectacular parque temático: una isla retirada donde los visitantes puedan observar dinosaurios reales. Con la última tecnología en el desarrollo de ADN, los científicos pueden clonar braquiosaurios, triceratops, velociraptors y un tiranosaurio rex, utilizando para ello la sangre fosilizada en ámbar contenida en insectos que los mordieron hace millones de años. Los paleontólogos Alan Grant, Ellie Sattler y Ian Malcolm visitan el parque y quedan muy sorprendidos con los resultados obtenidos. Pero cuando un problemático empleado manipula el sofisticado sistema de seguridad los dinosaurios escapan, obligando a los visitantes a luchar por su supervivencia.

A wealthy entrepreneur secretly creates a theme park featuring living dinosaurs drawn from prehistoric DNA. Before opening day, he invites a team of experts and his two eager grandchildren to experience the park and help calm anxious investors. However, the park is anything but amusing as the security systems go off-line and the dinosaurs escape.
1993 film by Steven Spielberg
